reviews.Comment: I have worked with consultants at varying scales within this organisation for almost 24 years.  I can genuinely say that this project was by far the best! From the RFP process to the actual implementation was all approached with the highest standards.  For once, it felt like we were working with other members of our own team as opposed to working with a consultant/integration partner. All with the same goal.... to make this a success!  The implementation was a great example of excellent team work from varying levels of our organisation and theirs but the thing that stood out, was the focus on not just implementation. It was the journey we went on from the reason for change, setting a combined vision, the team understanding our needs, recommending alternative approaches and playing back their understanding of our needs at each milestone. But once it was built, it didn't end there. The hypercare has gone above and beyond but also helping us set KPIs to measure and track the success has been first class.  So, it wasn't just delivering a product - it was the total package we received from the team at Deloitte.
They are so innovative in how they can streamline processes and procedures.

Deloitte Consulting LLP has consistently delivered exceptional quality and service to our office during the first 12 months of our Salesforce implementation project. In addition to the technical work required to standup a new instance of Salesforce to replace our legacy systems, Deloitte has performed a significant amount of business process reengineering work under this contract as part of the overall discovery and development process. Deloitte has exceeded expectations, from reengineering existing business processes as part of the development effort, to bringing in cyber experts to support our security needs, and developing a revised release strategy that eliminates dependency on legacy systems. Deloitte is proactively helping to navigate the challenging IT issues associated with this sort of transition and developing detailed materials around technical needs to help identify the right points of contact to minimize overall impact to the project. Deloitte remains flexible in delivery and has realigned resources on their team to accommodate changes to release plans in a way that is seamless to our office. Deloitte has performed exceptionally well and continues to impress.

Prisma Media hired Deloitte to implement Salesforce Analytics across the company. The consulting team supported the implementation of the solution in regards to project management, set up of the solution, development of dashboards, training and support for users. Thanks to their strong expertise on Salesforce products, their commitment, their business understanding and their user-centric mindset, Deloitte team helped us to lead the project to success.
To have a successful relationship with your supplier, you have to consider him more like an internal team or a true partner

Deloitte team has been able to support us across all project phases. Meaning they were more than supportive, they give us a very good support during all phases : knowledge transfert, capacity to dev (increase as well as decrease team size among the project needs) , analysis, change management, training, ...

Very good control of the project by partner and managers. Proposal updates to scope changes pro-actively managed by Deloitte, in a very fair and reasonable way. Project went over summer break, without causing delays. Deloitte showed being careful on the end-deliverable, not only functionality, but also emphasis was made on the UI aspects of the design.
VERY GOOD EXPERIENCE GREAT PROFESSIONALISM
Great strategic ally
It has the support and sufficient seriousness to guarantee the success of the project, despite the difficulties. 100% trustworthy supplier.

Working with Deloitte has been a partnership, they have helped guide our team in building usable solutions, solving decade-old problems while meeting the business needs. Our transformational journey has encompassed using Salesforce solutions to solve Customer & Employee Experiences, Deloitte has assisted us in tieing the solutions together and hitting our value realization goals.

The Deloitte team is well versed with SalesForce architecture, very well informed about the features and functionalities of SalesForce platforms and has created a very good LOS platform. Also, the team is very professional and helpful. We are extremely happy with the phase 1 implementation of SalesForce system.
Tony Krajewski and Jose Yamazaki are awesome brain trust in this space and industry leaders in providing top notch solutions.....all gold stars to them and the respective team !!!

The Deloitte Team was incredible. They proactively provided solutions for our business needs and went over and beyond to meet our needs. They also walked us through every solution and made us aware of risks and recommendations on how to solve them.
commitment

La experiencia con Deloitte Chile, y particularmente con nuestra Lider de Proyecto fue sumamente satisfactoria, constructiva y retadora. De manera diferente a lo que habían sido mis experiencias con otros consultores en temas digitales e IT, en este caso contamos con una Lider de Proyecto que entregó mucho más que su conocimiento técnico y su disposición laboral, y que siempre trató de ir más allá, entendiendo el por qué de la necesidad del negocio para buscar las mejores soluciones, con un involucramiento total, al máximo detalle y una vocación de trabajo que iba más allá del simple cumplimiento y que con mística convirtió los objetivos de su cliente, en los objetivos y metas propias.
Good partner. Flexibility Good Delivery
Cooperation with Deloitte was on very high level and they have been able to deliver desired outcomes.
Committed, tenacious and talented team led by Ben and Steve. Laser focus on delivering outcomes that resulted in material improvements in our customer, adviser and operational experiences.
They have been a true partner from day one. I feel like that we are both working towards the same goal and they share the same level of commitment to success that we do internally.

Deloitte supported the Siemens SF4S in the best way. We reached in the last 2 years all milestones and the requested quality. Deloitte is very flexibel in finding the right solution (focus 95% ootb) and technical approch for our project based on a great understanding of the used solutions and of business processes.

Project Quicksilver was about delivering a seamless Associate Experience (focused on self-service) @ scale while also upgrading the back end to Salesforce Lightening. The program was the first of it's kind in HR - using design thinking and agile methodology. Deloitte team brought a robust approach, including solid technical and functional skills to deliver the program outcomes. Their team has excellent Salesforce skills and were capable of standing up Lightening in our environment to meet our needs.
Timely, pro-active meticulous planning, high software quality is needed for an implementation of this nature.
It's great working with Deloitte Digital. I'm very glad that they help me with Salesforce!

We enjoyed a very positive experience in partnering with Deloitte for the B2B Ecommerce implementation. The team was very knowledgeable about the product and best practices to implement. The project management was clear and well executed. I would highly recommend Deloitte as a B2B Ecommerce partner.
This projects stayed on time, on budget, with high quality of deliverables. We can't be happier
Great team, very professional, super committed and going for the extra mile to deliver! Nice collaboration with the internal teams and very transparent communication.
It was highly professional to work with Deloitte Digital. Journey was phenomenal.!

I would strongly recommend Deloitte to another prospective client as during our nearly two-year relationship, they have designed & deployed three different phases of our platform and have stayed under budget and ahead of schedule each time. Additionally, their approach from Discovery to Deployment has enabled us to challenge our assumptions and design & deploy enhanced processes which have resulted in significant ROI and and an improved employee experience. Finally, their strong industry knowledge has enabled us to run faster as they were intimately familiar with the underlying data, the use cases which we were pursuing, and the personas that would need to be supported. Overall, we are extremely satisfied with Deloitte's performance.

Our team exceeded my expectations in terms of delivering with high quality under an aggressive timeline, which enabled the team to focus on fast-follow items during post-go live support rather than working through defects.  The team's responsiveness and ability to address issues which arose during the project build was critical to our success.
Partnering with Deloiite in our Digital journey has been very smooth thanks to the strong commitment and focus on our success shown by the team - great experience.

Deloitte Team helped us to deliver faster than expected strong added value module. Teams really added value on our project in order to identify best way to use the solution by proposing us best practices and reused functionalities.  Strongly recommend to work with them.

Deloitte Team know the product quite well and they give you good support when you are experiencing issues or missworking of the CRM. Even if the problem is quite complicated, they will look for the most accurated solution to help you.
The Deloitte team dedicated to LBPAM is helpful on Salesforce. They are very reactive in implementing new items.

Deloitte Digital are by far the most capable global delivery partner for Salesforce implementations. When it's multi-cloud, complicated implementations, their strong focus on unlocking business value from the platform makes projects that much more successful (and fun!).

The Cinder agency acquired by the Sydney Deloitte Branch had been briefed to implement Marketing Cloud with CRM. Unfortunately, it was nowhere near complete and alternative (soon after, problematic) solutions were implemented instead. The solution did not suit business requirements and there was no documentation to record what had been implemented (after trying to fix things, it didn't look like a lot).  On a positive, they were able to advise best practice and assisted with email sends with previous staff who did not specialise in email marketing - outside of scope. Would recommend to bill by the implementation, not by hours.  **UPDATE** 2/11/17  Had a meeting with members of the team who carried out the implementation and it was explained that the initial scope was changed multiple times from signing of SLA. The implementation team tried their best to accommodate these changes and restrictions in place. It was agreed that documentation of implementation and testing should have been in place however the initial client side team didn't , but they were happy to help rectify anything that was left unfinished.

reviews.Comment: Media Monks helped us to kick start our nurture program across Pardot and Salesforce platforms. The technical knowledge that the team displayed is second to none.
Overall, Media Monks are helpful and worked through a lot of processes to get us to the point of a solution. The consultants were a pleasure to deal with.
Very knowledgeable team, produced great results
Expertise and assistance delivered in a professional and friendly manner.

We engaged with Maverick to assist us as our business started ramping back up after a significant pause due to COVID. Based on our experience, we have increased revenue and have reduced FT staff based on their level of support and expertise. The team working with us has worked hard to understand our business and the nuances of the industry we serve. I would highly recommend Maverick as a partner.

Maverick Digital spent the time to listen and understand what our needs really were. They ensured we were able to take what they developed and build upon it ourselves by providing us additional training and written documentation as to exactly what they did for us. Communication was open and they were easy to work with.
Maverick took the time to understand our needs. It felt like they were invested in our success. They ensured we were able to take what they developed and build upon it ourselves going forward.

Media.Monks were most helpful in realising the requirement for a series of sales pipeline and account management dashboards for our sales team, who had previously been working in the dark. Tanya's expert help and guidance resulted in increased sales visibility and performance and positive feedback from sales leaders. We are hopeful to work with Tanya and the Media.Monks team again in the near future.
Destined are extremely knowledgeable and are able to apply calmness and precision through delivery

As a fintech business, leveraging technology solutions to automate and streamline our processes and customer journey is a key priority. Destined consistently delivered efficient solutions and high quality digital assets. Our technology and marketing teams were provided with expert guidance and support throughout the process.
Destined has a great team of experts, Providing them with clear objectives, they are able to deliver.
Clayton from Destined has been extremely helpful in developing an automated follow up program which has resulted an ROI within weeks.

We needed a partner who could approach our Pardot delivery from a marketing angle, engaging the team with a value proposition rather than the rollout of yet another tool. Destined delivered on this, and the result is a marketing team empowered and enabled to take our strategy to the next level. Thanks to the Destined team for their expertise and wisdom.
We are very satisfied with the customer focus provided to us and meeting our needs.

The Destined team (Pav, Ling & Steph) were extremely helpful in the entire process. We were always well informed of the project steps, status, and potentials risks. They were well aligned with our objectives and continued to check in re our satisfaction with each project step. They were very organised as a team and left us feeling very confident in using marketing cloud.
Great partner. Having an understanding of Salesforce going into a project will help ensure effective collaboration.

We engaged Destined Pty Ltd to implement Salesforce Sales Cloud after considering many other CRM products and implementation partners. The Destined team remained constantly engaged with us through requirement gathering, solution design, build, UAT and eventually implementation and training phases. The team was able to understand our changing business needs and optimise the solution accordingly. They spent time getting to know our business needs and built it to a point where we can scale it further if needed in the future. I'll highly recommend Destined Pty Ltd as a Salesforce partner, especially for real estate clients.  Manish Jha Digital Services Manager Village Building Co.

I think this review is related to the Marketing Cloud component of our project. Pavanit provided excellent service, he was very knowledgeable, he listened well to our business requirements and translated them into easy to understand solutions, provided show cases along the way to our business keeping them fully informed. He ran the training which was very clear and concise and well presented. All presentations were excellent. Pavanit worked with us as a team and the Marketing Cloud implementation was very smooth without issues. Well done to Destined and Pavanit!

We are a Not for Profit organization looking to move our regular communications with supporters to an integrated solution with SalesForce.  Destined, the consulting partner, was able to provide expertise in marketing module integrations with Salesforce. With their help, we identified our business requirements and explored a number of different options. Marketing Cloud was found to be the best solution to meet our business requirements.  The deep dive sessions were excellent, however, the handover of requirements to the implementation team was incomplete.  Destined then provided expertise in implementation of Marketing Cloud and Integration with our customized Salesforce database. Significant time and effort was spent in the design phase to ensure that the correct information was synchronized across to Marketing Cloud.  We have over 70 content creators, with basic to expert computer skills, who will be accessing the system all over the world. We were able to produce a solution that catered to all skill levels.  Destined, also helped produce excellent training videos that could be used to train users in person and on line.  We were able to raise any issues we were having with our consulting partner and these were resolved promptly.  We are very happy with Destined as an implementation partner and plan to use them for further Salesforce improvement Projects.

It's been fantastic! We highly recommend working with Destined as your Salesforce partner.  With Destined's help, we've managed to go-live of our CPQ system within 12 weeks in Shootsta, which is no small achievement given the capabilities and complexities of the CPQ tool.
Their knowledge of the data model was invaluable in being able to appropriately construct the most useful system for our business, considering current and future use cases.
Excellent - couldn't work without them

Destined were fantastic! From the initial pre-sales/discovery that occurred with James Abbott through to the implementation led by Nicolas Delgorge, we had a wonderful Salesforce experience. We ran the project in agile format blending Destined staff with our in-house team, this was very successful and allowed knowledge transfer to occur gradually. Overall, our transformation project was a big success! We look forward to working with Destined again in the future as our business grows and our Salesforce needs evolve.

Our choice of Partner in Destined was due to their experience in Local Government and in-depth knowledge in the area of Economic Development as exceptional, clear and precise. The Destined team not only understood our requirements but were able to anticipate requirements in advance of our needs. This was especially the case in the area of investment attraction where we had not introduced this aspect into our team but had planned it for the future, the set up by Destined had these requirements already met.  Destined provided consultancy for the end to end implementation and support for the Platform, - this includes requirement elicitation, solution design, implementation, testing, data migration, training and ongoing support

The scoping session was very thorough and the time taken to listen to our requirements, concerns and past experiance were very much taken into consideration in order to create a solution. The implementation and timings were well communicated and openly discussed if timeframe required changing. Looking forward to working on the next project with the team.

Destined team delivered holistic value with timely and effective outcomes across our Marketing Cloud implementation program. As a result, we have growing confidence our Marketing Technology investment with Salesforce can be maximised, our automation, personalisation and single view for customer ideals are enhanced, and our Marketing and Sales operatives are enabled to succeed in executing wide-ranging customer acquisition, engagement, retention activities. Thank you Destined for remaining focused (with us) on our commercial objectives during this project - we appreciate the excellence.

Please note for the purpose of this feedback, I'm referring purely to the Marketing Cloud piece of integration.  Anuj (from Destined) has been extremely helpful providing a solution that is tailored for our needs (considering that Marketing Cloud itself is not the most user-friendly automation out there). He went over the scope of the project, being available after hours and over the duration of the contract, to make sure he would deliver a perfectly working product.  I would not hesitate to recommend Destined to integrate Marketing Cloud with your current CRM and to create ad hoc journeys for your clients  This unfortunately can not be said for the Service and Sales cloud integration.

Our challenge was to create/update the appropriate fields in Salesforce supported with validation rules to ensure users entered data, that would provide insights from our Salesforce Enterprise and Einstein apps.  The output being successful creation of 60+ complex reports/dashboards. Further the inevitable scope creep required additional work in parallel and the teams from Destined collaborated very well with the Energy Exemplar team remained flexible throughout offering solutions and suggestions to guide us on this journey.  Our project had a global focus which required some unsociable hours and Destined attended most of these (Zoom) meetings to keep the project moving at pace, ensuring all regions on the same page in terms of status and next steps  Overall, this was a successful project that was delivered in a timely and concise manner . I would not hesitate to recommend Destined. The proof of this being that I have already allocated them another project in Jan 21.

Absolutely loved working with Destined, and particularly with our Salesforce consultant Emma. Each step of the process was engaging, accessible and confidence-building. Cannot recommend this partner enough.

The Destined Team were great to partner with to roll out our Salesforce instance - consistently going over and above with support, communication and solutions to ensure the platform was conducive to our business operations.
Very happy with the service we received
OUTSTANDING JOB!

This project was of limited scope: to stand up campaigns in our Salesforce Enterprise environment where our focus has been master data management adn cusotmer service although in a B2B context. As a govenrment utility with service and regulatroy relationship with a defined number of clients, it was about adapting a marketing tool to track and monitor recruitment of clients into a collaborative relationship.  Destined were very flexible in addressing our requirements by adapting a standard Saeslfrice tool to our unique requirements, and ensuring the outcome was the best possible, within the constraints of the brief and the Salesforce product.  Whilst the project took longer than expected to deliver this was due mostly to constraints on our capacity in the COVID environment, as it was to the Destined's consulatant's dilligence. The consultant was able to dip in and out of our porject to suit our availability. Overall this propably had a benefit to the quality of the outcome, due to addtional time for us to test the solution and tweak the design. In a larger project with tighter timelines and dedicated resources this may not have been possible.

Alex Kaye & his team at Destined have been a great team to work with. They made the implementation very easy, and we're already seeing the results in the short team Pardot has been active in our org. I'd recommend Destined as an implementation partner, and would also be happy to use them for other projects around Salesforce that we need to do in the future.

Destined 4 Pty Ltd have been thorough while also being friendly and helpful. Their ability to understand the complexity of our deliverable in such a short time was impressive. While nothing has been delivered as yet, I am optimistic.

We are up and running with Pardot after an enjoyable implementation with Destined. Tammy Begley provided invaluable support throughout our implementation sharing her recommendations, as well as being encouraging while we learnt how to use Pardot. The combination of her past experience using Pardot as a marketing manager, along with her technical knowledge of Pardot as an implementation partner, makes her an exceptional educator in the platform.

The guys at Destined went above and beyond to fit a 4 week project into 1 week and really bailed us out of what could have been a really damaging situation for our business. They were professional, personable and understood what we needed right from the outset, despite having a really niche setup requirement. I will use them again for all our Salesforce needs in future without hesitation.

Highly skilled across the spectrum of needs relevant to deliver the technology and solutions consumers are coming to expect in modern healthcare. They know the Salesforce ecosystem really well, know how to apply and connect to other non-SF solutions, and embrace agility and sustainability in their deliverables.

As with any new tech implementation, there are things that won't go according to plan. With that being said, the Maverick Team did an excellent job of sticking with the plan and ensuring we had a successful launch. We appreciate the relationship built.
very helpful and will use for future Q&A's!
Destined were great to work with and really helped us get our environment up and running. Thank you Seb :)

Maverick has been a blessing for our business and organization as we navigate the complicated business environment, expertise, dedication, and honesty, are just some of the attributes we love about them. Real partnerships are based on trust and willingness to help, and MD has been nothing but a great partner

We hired Maverick to build a Community that would transform how we partner with our own customers. We had product mocks, ideas, and branding guidelines and they put together a comprehensive proposal of exactly how it would be done. The discovery process to get us a quote was faster and more effective than any other partner I have used in the past. They were able to generate a quote that was realistic & fair from a timeline and budgetary standpoint.  The actual work output that they put together was amazing. They took our mocks and turned them into a full fledged product offering in weeks. They built a slack channel for our team and their team to collaborate on to make communication throughout the project very effective. They finished the project on time and on budget and consulted with us along the way to make the finished product better than we intended it to be. Their project managers that are involved pre-sale don't disappear during implementation which was so appreciated to make sure the initial vision is being seen from pre-sale to finishing the project. Maverick is the best Salesforce partner I have worked with and would definitely

Maverick's discovery process helped to ensure we captured the data we needed across all our different division. The integration work allowed us to transfer critical data between systems to give our sales reps the reporting structure needed to focus on the right accounts. Setting up automation and reminders has helped us work more efficiently and stay on top of what is important.

Destined are superb at what they do. They know their products inside out (better than the Salesforce team) and are clear with delivery plans, regular communications and delivering on time. They are the reason we went with Salesforce.

Destined broke down our requirements through a thorough planning process and were able to guide us through how we could achieve what we needed Salesforce to deliver by understanding exactly what we needed. Their responsiveness to our extremely compact timeline and ability to spell out from day 1 what was achievable in our timeframe set expectations and gave us achievable targets to meet. The Destined team were incredibly clear communicators and were able to easily explain to our very raw experience level how and why they were completing tasks was not only impressive but also a refreshing way to work collaboratively. I could not recommend Destined highly enough, their service and delivery were 100% and I look forward to our future engagements with them to drive more value out of our Salesforce CRM.

Destined spent the time to learn about our business processes and then tailored a solution to meet our needs. They offer the full Salesforce solution, specifically enabling us to successfully utilise Pardot and SalesCloud combination to drive and measure our lead acquisition through to opportunities.  Destined were able to simplify our existing processes, remove complexity and guiding us to work to 'best practice' use of the Salesforce products, so were were able to get the most out of the system.
Destind where able to take us from knowing nothing to being quite capable with Pardot and Salesforce and this has been a great helop with the big move online due to COVID. A
Destined provide a fantastic service to our business. They are proactive and helpful at every turn. I would highly recommend Destined for Pardot implentation and management

Working with Destined as our Salesforce partner was a great experience. Our organisation required a CRM solution to map and manage a complex stakeholder framework, and Destined delivered above and beyond. Thank you for your support, commitment and dedication to the process.
Couldn't faulty Tammy as a partner - she really listened to what we wanted to achieve and was incredibly engaging at the workshop - my team found her to be very relatable and knowledgeable
Great communication and competitive pricing. Followed through with a great end product.

Destined understood how to balance all our business constraints. We experienced true collaboration, side by side help, and super responsiveness in addition to real answers and communication outlining the pros and cons of our requirements. A great way to work!
Highly recommend Destined. The staff are patient, have incredible knowledge on the products and are very professional.
Working with Destined was an absolute pleasure. There were no surprises, everything was properly scoped and implemented, on time and on budget. Can't recommend them highly enough.

Destined were a very reliable and knowledgeable implementation partner for our company. They consistently delivered on all outcomes and results, and were very generous in providing extra time and guidance throughout the process. The turnaround time for our adoption of Pardot and Salesforce upgrade was phenomenal. I would highly recommend Destined to any prospective customers!
Destined have been an absolute pleasure to work with. Great communication and support the whole way, including answering a lot of my ad hoc questions! Would highly recommend.
Destined are a fantastic business partner
Absolutely amazing experience! If anyone is looking for a Pardot implementation partner, look no further than Destined.

I have worked with PWC on multiple Salesforce projects for two different companies. They bring a high level of expertise and understanding to run the project from discovery through to completion and support of the overall platform at the end. I have worked with them on multiple clouds including Service, Sales, Marketing, and Community.
Very deep expertise and a balance approach to scoping and implementation that advocates for the business.

It’s a pleasure working with ABSI. Among their key competencies : very good comprehension skills of our specific needs as an non-profit organization, comprehensive user training, respect of deadlines, customization of the CRM environment to fit our needs, fluent data preparation and import, very good after launch support. We higly recommend the ABSI-Salesforce team !

PwC was able to complete a Service Cloud transformation project for a high tech manufacturer in less than 8 weeks start to finish. This project included the use of a new SFDC configuration, Knowledge, the Service Cloud Console with Case Feed Page Layouts, and Customer Portal.  The project team collaborated well and through the use of a hybrid-agile implementation approach, they were able to deliver on-time and on-budget.

reviews.Comment: Candybox has been a wonderful partner to us. They aren’t just executors, they help us define the solution based off simple problem statements.

The team at Candybox is incredibly dynamic. Challenged with an inherited Salesforce org that did not align with our business needs, Candybox was able to quickly understand our requirements and make recommendations that would have otherwise gone overlooked. Their level of service and responsiveness is unmatched and it's clear that they are incredibly knowledgeable in this space.

We brought Candybox in to help us cleanup and improve our SFDC integrations as well as be our platform experts. In this regard, they've exceeded my expectations. They have been thorough and timely. When we scope a project we get a honest timeline and they can execute with only minimal course correction from our team. Beyond that, they are great people to work with, I often have to remind myself they are vendors because of the way they've meshed with our organization.

We brought CandyBox in to help with our sales cloud implementation. Candybox does a great job working closely with you to understand your specific business’ needs and building solutions to solve your unique business’ problems, all while actively communicating their progress every step of the way. Other consultants I have worked with in the past have tried to implement their standard one-size fits all solution onto their clients as they quickly move from one to the next. Even in my short time working with them, I learned about new features and saw potential solutions to problems I hadn’t seen used previously, and I now have what I learned in my toolkit. I enjoyed working with them a lot.

Candybox exceeded our expectations! They feel like an extension of my team. They brought specialized and advanced expertise that enabled us to tackle bigger projects and to do them faster. I am excited about my ongoing partnership with them and the business success we'll continue to drive.
Candybox has been a lifesaver, I highly recommend them to any revenue org who needs support leveling up their systems.

We have nothing but good things to say about Candybox. Projects were appropriately scoped and completed in a timely manner consistently, and the people we worked alongside were understanding and knowledgeable. It's extraordinarily simple to recommend Candybox as a development partner, and we are grateful to have had them.
Diverse team with expertise in all functional RevOps areas that are great at finding the right solution for your company's needs.

Partnering with Kathryn and the Candybox team was an absolute pleasure. We needed to consolidate our disparate customer support systems (email, phone, and chat) into one unified experience, Salesforce Service Cloud. From assessing current state to proposing and executing solutions, the team was swift, prompt, and delightful. They helped train our staff to ensure that the new systems were adopted, and we saw a 100% adoption rate within one week of launching. Additionally, they crafted reports and a dashboard to measure results. Ultimately, we saw a decrease in response times and an increase in customer satisfaction.  Additionally, Candybox was quick to adapt to feedback and made every effort to exceed expectations - bringing their collective expertise across a variety of different systems to meet our needs even outside the scope of this project. Kathryn and her team were thoughtful and deliberate - ensuring that the solutions implemented were constructed to scale as our business grows. I highly recommend Candybox as a partner for any early-stage startup looking to quickly augment and streamline systems.

Candbox was an absolute pleasure to do business with. We initially hired them to help us with SFDC process consolidation and optimization (process builders, flows, workflow rules, etc.). Our org had many stale processes that were causing various timeout errors when our end users were trying to conduct their day-to-day business. Candybox's professionalism and attention to detail not only enabled us to accurately diagnose and eradicate the crux of the issue, but they were also able to help us reduce our technical debt by 70%! Candybox's unique consultative approach is what really sets them apart from previous partners we've done business with. You could tell that they took pride in their work and really cared about our immediate and future success. 10/10 will work with them again!
It was great to work with CandyBox. The value we now have is amazing and the team always advised in the best way.

reviews.Comment: It was an outstanding job what the team did on this project.
Technically presents good knowledge. Strategic Consultancy point of view requires some improvement.

TCS was engaged to assist us with our adoption issues and right from the beginning they were eager to dive in. The highly skilled TCS group was able to utilize their collective experiences to make recommendations that others might not have come up with. Likewise they have repeatedly proven through this engagement to flex to the needs that we have presented and that they are a partner that can assist with providing a long-term vision for an organization such as ours.
TCS helped our organization to realize journey towards API economy using Mulesoft effectively.  Thanks Rahul Kadam System Development Architect, Enterprise Data PPD, part of Thermo Fisher Scientific

With Guys Like Thomas Servis, I feel solution delivery and business communication has been fantastic. From SFDC knowledge and delivering solutions with top code quality has hallmark. I feel we are achieving what we planning for this year with great confidence
Trusted & excellent partner!
Very dedicated team that understands the need of the client and finds the best solution to meet those needs
TCS goes above and beyond in meeting the needs of customers. They are proactive about resourcing needs and collaborate.

Aditya and the Team at TCS are an experienced and efficient team, willing to investigate cutting edge solutions and implement them using project methodologies that your organisation utilises (in my case Scrum).

TCS has done an excellent job in the most recent engagement related to a CPQ Implementation. We are very happy with the level of engagement their team was able to establish with our teams across the globe, the program management capabilities, qualities of the solution, identification and timely escalation of risks, and the overall risk management and communication throughout the project.

TCS provide a broad range of services to us and the Salesforce Practice combined with Customer Experience practice is a great combination to partner with. Excellent team and Leadership. Managing global salesforce support and development needs for Birla Carbon efficiently. Highly recommended IT partner to drive new technology requirements and derive optimum business value.

TCS team has been doing very good or excellent work with this and several other developments. They are flexible partner who are executing the business needs on agreed schedule with very good quality. They have a big pool of good developers with different levels of experience.

TCS is a competent company that delivered a great salesforce product, but they did have a few personnel changes and recommended some products that they had knowledge gaps in and fully utilised support from 3rd party partner companies eg. conga and Quip. Our Salesforce partner helped us significantly to continue the development of a complex and heavily customised set of risk management products for 1500 end users. The response was more geared towards engagement costs, checking deliverables off and not really focused on providing solution advisory to Comerica. So, while we consider the staff aug model to be successful, if TCS is looking to be more of a solution leader in the Salesforce ecosystem, TCS leadership must be focused on setting up their teams with the directional focus towards that in an engagement.

1) TCS developer team worked many hours and some weekends to meet a challenging timeline. 2) The TCS project model we used had one onshore BA and all offshore developers. One reason we faced rework and lost time is we did not have a developer available to collaborate with the business team during their hours. 3) TCS leadership stepped in to help the team work through roadblocks we hit. They showed us they valued us as a partner. 4) TCS team was very professional in how they interacted with the business team.

Our Implementation partners demonstrate a true collaboration and partnership with the clients. They have helped us from Day 1 with guidance and direction to have a smooth Salesforce implementation. Our most recent experience with TCS on a Salesforce project was similar to other Salesforce projects they have done for us . . . outstanding. TCS is an excellent partner.

TCS made top tier talent available to our small project on very short notice. The deliverables were exactly what we needed to move ahead quickly. We have already engaged TCS in another project with a second business line, and are again, off to an excellent start.
The two Solution Architects provided by TCS to me are exceptional: both stakeholder management and technical competency. Trusted partner.

Provided innovative relevant solutions for our business and set our teams up for success after the project has transitioned and was completed. Excellent partnership and I would recommend them for teams looking to implement Chatbot functionality using AI/ML.

TCS, provide the necessary structure and support to truly push through an agile and forward thinking project. The solutions provided are always considered and measured against the future plans for a company needing to take the next leap into CRM based solutions.

TCS are by far the most committed delivery partner that I have worked with in my time working in IT. TCS reacts quickly and professionally to our engagement requests, they work flexibly and dynamically with resources who are globally distributed. Their project and operational organisations work seamlessly together and I am very happy with their overall performance.

Medela currently has a consultancy, support & maintenance contracts with Tata Consultancy Services for our CRM. reviews.Comment: Toptal provided us with a top-notch developer who has been great at understanding our needs and quick to execute on them. He picked up new skills that we required for the project and adapted to our changing requirements. He's also been great about promoting best practices not only with respect to Salesforce but software development in general. We're very happy with Toptal for custom Salesforce development.

I've been a customer of Toptal for a few projects now and I can say with confidence that the level of talent I had the opportunity to work with was unmatched. I continue to work with a number of their members on a longterm basis and I hope to continue working with them well into the future.  From the speed of the procurement and the ease of the interview process to the trust they've built with me and the cost effective nature of their business, they are my go to partner for salesforce talent in the industry right now.

I have been a client of Toptal since 2017. They have provided essential software engineering resources for my time in academic research, two startups, and now in the commercial sector. I have formed a habit of taking Toptal with me when I change organizations. That speaks to the incredibly consistent resources they provide with very accurate skillsets for my required role. Though starting with Toptal to procure software engineering resources, I have now seen their work in both hardware engineering and financial analysis. I can say that, without a doubt, my next resource from Toptal will be a perfect fit for any role I identify.  In addition to the very skilled talent, they are quite cost-effective. Please let me clarify. I have, in many situations, found myself hesitant to use resources I've identified myself at the cost of under $50/hour. On the other hand, I have never hesitated to use a Toptal resource for $150/hour or more. The reason lies in the "overall cost of ownership" when engaging engineers. While my $50/hour engineer may build a complete solution in 40 hours, the $150/hour Toptal resource invariably completes the same work in less than a day. The result is that with Toptal, I get the best results for as low as half the final cost to the project. It is this calculus that brought me to use Toptal exclusively in my startups, in lieu of any full-time employees. This engagement enabled me to maintain a successful business on an extremely tight budget.  Now that I am the Director of Engineering for a multi-million dollar company, I continue to use Toptal because thier model scales. Where my startups may save $5,000/year on a tiny project, my current organization may save upward of half a million dollars each year.  I will continue to recommend Toptal to anyone that could benefit from their services. This includes "old school" software engineers, like myself, in addition to "down to business" project managers.

Toptal has long been a trusted partner for us and has consistently delivered highly qualified talent in an incredibly short time frame. They get up and running on projects really quickly and make the whole process feel simple. The fact that they then manage to do this at reasonable rates makes them one of most valued partners.

Toptal was instrumental in finding the perfect candidate for the consultant work we needed. They were attentive, kind and quick to match our needs with their talent pool. It was a relief to have a wide selection of pre-screened candidates to choose from at reasonable rates.

reviews.Comment: The Astound Commerce team has been excellent, from the point of entering the competitive tender process for Hobbycraft's replatform project (which selected partner then technology) through to the team's transition in focus from 'Project' to 'Continuous Improvement'. This is made possible by the vast levels of prior implementation experience, which was brought to bear in a pragmatic and enabling manner - always supportive of best outcome.  Always willing to consider alternatives and push the boundaries, the Astound Commerce team has been an excellent partner that has become a trusted and highly valued extension of the Hobbycraft team.

Absolutely seamless experience with every team member being a pleasure to work with!

Team work and honesty are key in building a good partnership, this ensures that expectations are well managed and outcomes are as expected.
Astound bring a raft of experience in solutionising and delivery on SFCC, they also provide adaptive methodology to ensure they meet your specific business needs.

The team at Astound feel like an extension of my own team. They understand our business and the way we work. We communicate openly and regularly which enables us to deliver on time and work through any alterations required.

It's a partnership, take time at the start to listen to their experience and share what's most important to your business. Overall Context and Vision will help all parties stay on track when things get tough. We jointly built a set of principles to guide us throughout - they proved invaluable. Any transformation is about the people delivering it and the teams that will manage it going forward - don't forget the people!

During this 2 years working with them we confirmed that they are able to deliver with the highest quality standards, always protecting the core functionality of the platform to make sure that we deliver the best Customer Experience, with the right Performance. It has been a great partnership.  Even we are very satisfied, I believe they can increase their knowledge of Department Stores. also their knowledge of Mexican Market and to understand faster the right engagement model with a Customer (eg. Time and Materials vs Fix Price). Also to be more open to Knowledge Transfer during the project and be more strong when they see risks (eg. our OMS was not the right solution).  I am really happy with the work done and I am open for other Customer references.
Working with Astound has been a great experience especially working in a staff augmentation model and post launch support.

Astound was incredibly pragmatic and efficient with providing solutions and a way forward to bring this project to completion on time and on budget during a global pandemic. The outcome of FLOR.com exceeded our expectations--they continue to be such a valuable partner.

Excellent Partners for deployment of Salesforce Commerce Cloud. They are business partners - ensuring that the best ROI is achieved for your business requirements. Their processes are flexible to meet internal practices and have a stringent documentation process that ensures clarity without any compromises. 7/5 would recommend.

waterfall approach. The specification phase is taking long. For an unexperienced customer this might come in as too difficult. We worked with an experienced SF project manager on our (client) side as well to get the job done

reviews.Comment: Nebula and in particular Jiri have fully understood what we are looking to achieve and used their knowledge to make it work for our org.

Nebula were quick to respond to our initial inquiry and hosted really insightful discovery sessions with us. Throughout the project they were helpful and flexible at every stage, allowing for changes/updates to the project scope along the way. We highly recommend them as a Salesforce Partner.

These sessions were invaluable. Zoe was a brilliant facilitator. Highly recommend to any business looking to scale up their email marketing strategy and leveraging relationships with Sales, Marketing and Data for maximum impact for lead nurturing, reporting and measuring roi.
Extremely knowledgeable whilst being able to explain complex matters with non-tech individuals. Very efficient in carrying out tasks

We needed to implement Salesforce CPQ for selling SaaS products with multiple bundle scenarios that would help the sales team obtain pricing quickly and accurately.  We were introduced to Nebula Consulting by our Salesforce Account Manager and from the offset we were impressed with their knowledge of CPQ and their work ethics.  The regular check-in meetings were helpful to understand where they were with the build and enable each party to ask and/or answer any questions that had arose. They also produced explainer videos on certain aspects which we found invaluable to really understand a particular process.

We partnered with Nebula Consulting when our Salesforce admin left the organisation, leaving a large knowledge gap in our team regarding our system. Nebula fully scoped and reviewed our system ahead of agreeing the support package. They have provided an excellent service in providing solutions to issues and implementing process improvements, all while upskilling and supporting our new Salesforce admin. I would recommend working them.

Nebula worked in a very collaborative way, to ensure that we learned as they developed and deployed CPQ. This meant that we quickly became self-sufficient and have managed ongoing queries ourselves. I would highly recommend Nebula to bring CPQ into your business in an efficient and effective way.

We've had a longstanding relationship with Nebula Consulting for some time, and they have got to know our business and its processes very well. I certainly regard the team, whether consultant or developer, as partners, and value the contribution they make to our business as a result

Nebula Consulting listened to our needs, and delivered on the brief. Our needs were complicated due to the nature of our business, and it is not a case of switching on one of the Salesforce tools, it required them thinking of solutions, which can only come from having vast experience with the Salesforce product.  We could not have built such a useful product without Nebula Consulting, plus their support throughout the year has been amazing. The team there are friendly, knowledgable and fun to work with.

As a small business we needed to update an inherited system which didn't deliver for us. Nebula listened to our ideas and shared how they could be implemented in a straight forward and painless fashion. They shared the challenges of our package and found ways around to make our processes easier and a more natural user experience. We couldn't have done this on own. The knowledge of how Salesforce works and what its capable of doing was invaluable. Along with their expertise, it made working through this project a journey of discovery for us as a company and what we are now able to do. We leave this project with more knowledge of the CRM than we had before so creating confidence that we can maintain and possibly progress with further ideas in the future. Nebula will be our first choice for helping us with the growth of our SalesForce system.

Since working with the Nebula Senior Consultant (Kerry Watt), our business has gained a greater understanding of how our system functionality can best be utilised as well as helping our organisation rollout user training and adoption across the senior staff. Since working with Nebula we have received an exceptional standard of service and knowledge from the team which I would not hesitate in recommending and will be a pleasure to continue with this relationship long into the future.

I have worked with Doug at Nebula plus various colleagues of his for over a year now. I initially hired them to scope and build our CPQ installation, and after the success of the project I now partner with them across multiple other projects such as B2BMA dashboard builds, Pardot improvements and a lengthy advanced approvals development project. We now work on a retainer of monthly hours which we get a huge amount of value from and I plan to continue indefinitely.  The stand out features which makes the ongoing relationship a no brainer for us, - We can use the hours to bring in various experts matched to our current needs, with Doug as a gate keeper making sure any changes are aligned with our higher strategy and priorities - Dedicated, flexible consultants willing to go the extra mile to help us to reach deadlines, or trouble shoot any issues we have with virtually no notice - Knowledgeable consultants who will challenge us on our ideas / requests and push us towards more future proofed / best practise solutions - Genuinely lovely people to work with!

Nebula Consulting are true experts when it comes to Salesforce and Pardot and provided incredible support to me and my colleagues as we worked towards our certification. Not only are they product experts but they work so well with people and understand how to communicate complex ideas and connect it back to our requirements.

It has been a positive experience working with our Consultants over the last 3 years over multiple projects. They have supported us with their expertise in both business process use cases & technical knowledge of salesforce.
We could not have wished for a better partner. Perfect in everyway- knowledgeable, flexible, responsive, communicative and accommodating. Strongly recommend.
We could not have wished for a better partner. Perfect in everyway- knowledgeable, flexible, responsive, communicative and accommodating. Strongly recommend.
We had great experience while working on this specific project

Highly recommend the Nebula team. A seamless project from start to finish, with excellent support, communication, and results. It's great when you find good partners who genuinely improve your business, so its very likely we will end up working with them again. Thanks Dori and team.

Great partner to work with with excellent product and technical knowledge. Would recommend to anyone!  We hired Nebula to implement our CPQ use case and it was a great process with minimal necessary UAT as the solution was so robust.

An engaged team, responsive and available to help shape the scope of the different projects. Always providing alternatives and suggestions to maximise the effort. The team is flexible and available for trouble shooting & to fine tune enhancements as needed during roll out phases.

Easy to work with, super knowledgable and effective. I would highly recommend Nebula to anyone needing strategic, operational and technical help with both Pardot and Salesforce. Looking forward to working with them again in the future.

I would not hesitate to recommend Nebula to any business looking for consultancy or advice regarding Pardot as my experience has been very positive.
Partner Portal was delivered as expected on time and to budget meeting all expectations. In general the experience was very satisfactory.

We have been working with Nebula for a number of years, on several Pardot implementations. Whichever project they have worked on with us, they have very quickly understood our business and process flows, and have been able to offer very relevant, tailored solutions. As there are always hurdles with complicated technical setups, Nebula have made sure to tackle route causes of issues and provide excellent advise on general best practise. Training and availability are always very good, with support again being very thorough and efficient. A very friendly and approachable team, we have found their contribution absolutely invaluable in adopting all aspects of Pardot.

The project was difficult as it was a historic thing that had stopped working because of other factors within our company. Nebula worked out a way of doing what we needed and then worked out the most cost effective way of implementing it. Kerry and Dan kept me updated throughout the project and were both friendly and professional.
Nebula consulting has been really excellent

Our business have worked with Nebula for over 12 months. What started off as a simple integration has evolved in a much wider project involving Pardot and numerous appexchange custom integrations. Every step of the way Nebula have led the projects, communicated clearly and delivered on time. They are now an integral part of our business and give us confidence to push forward with improvements to make Salesforce the most effective and powerful tool it can be for our business.

The scoping process was excellent, Nebula took the time to not only understand our sales process but also explored the mindset of our users and came up with a collaborative solution accordingly. There was so much logic to the proposed design document that it easy to explain to senior management and for the team to discuss and buy into. The subsequent roll out was tested extensively in the sandbox, diligently planned and in turn executed to limit disruption and maintain business operations. The roll out has been so successful thus far it has completely changed peoples attitudes towards the system and how it can function as an integral tool as opposed to a tedious burden. I couldn't recommend the work of Nebula more highly, we have already referred them to our counterparts in the states.

reviews.Comment: At TAMS, we have used NTT to help implement our Sales Cloud, Service Cloud and Customer Communities. We have been "wowed" with the quality of their resources, technical expertise and overall willingness to be flexible when required. We presented NTT with a set of challenges where they met or exceeded our expectations. Where I was most impressed with NTT is their willingness to evolve and make adjustments as they received our feedback. The next engagement became better than the first as they took our feedback from the previous project and implemented them into the next. Because of their willingness to quickly adapt and accommodate our needs, NTT has become a trusted partner.

I have worked with many of the staff at NTT Centerstance in the past 6 months and I am happy to say that there are 2 consistent traits throughout the organization. Those traits are professionalism and knowledgeable. I have been involved in 15 - 20 implementations with NTT Centerstance and although most of those implemenationst went well, in the few times things didn't go smoothly they were smart enough to figure out how to make things right and professional enough to do the right thing by our mutual clients. Thank you for making my job a bit easier by giving me comfort in knowing when I choose to work with NTTCS, that you treat your client implementations like one of your own.

Centerstance impressed us from the beginning, not only with their immediate understanding of our unique requirements but also with their ability to swiftly evaluate and comprehend the end result we were striving to achieve. The end product they assisted us in developing could not have been more satisfactory, both in functionality and in aesthetic delivery. Bravo!!

I had the pleasure of working with Centerstance while contracted by lifestyle retailer Tommy Bahama to architect and implement a new customer operations infrastructure in support of their young rapidly growing ecommerce business. Salesforce was chosen to provide a single solution for integrating all guest services contact channels, from incoming guest emails and telephone calls to the subsequent addition of product review alerts, social media and chat. The Centerstance team was responsive, professional, knowledgable and very hard working to deliver solutions within a short retail deployment window.  Centerstance provided deep salesforce experience and flexible technical options to help our project team deliver phase one, email2case and web2case with a customer database load in 2.5 months from procurement to go live, just in time to support a record holiday season! A special shout out to Dane Lange, our Centerstance Solutions Architect, who was by our side 24x7 through design, implementation, troubleshooting, tweaking and redesign.  Phase two of the project required the integration of an on-demand telephony solution and Bazaarvoice product alerts, in addition to the development of new back office processes within SF. Centerstance once again worked side by side with us to develop workflows and page layouts, design custom objects, and troubleshoot throughout the implementations.  The resulting infrastructure provides Tommy Bahama with leading edge and rapidly scalable cloud solutions to cost effectively manage seasonal volumes, provide exceptional customer service to its guests and gain deep insight to customer feedback and requests. I have no hesitation in utilizing Centerstance for future projects!

We've used Centerstance both for our initial implementation of Salesforce and on enhancement projects post deployment. I can't say enough about how great they are to work with! They are professional and thorough. The quality of their work is excellent and they make good recommendations on how to save money by creatively leveraging standard functionality or augmenting functionality with free/cheap AppExchange partners. We did a time and materials bid and they came in well under budget which allowed us to deliver additional enhancements outside of the project original scope. I highly recommend them for new deployments and on-going projects. They will help you be successful!!

I just wanted to provide some feedback about working with Centerstance on the recent upgrades for HET Salesforce.   Centerstance was exceptional to work with and contributed on several key fronts:  - quality programming – the work they completed for us was thoroughly tested and delivered seamlessly  - project management – Centerstance provided updates, timelines and coordinated meetings - his ability to focus the project team was very valuable  - thought leadership – Centerstance applied critical thinking throughout the project and caught several process related issues we missed  Overall, they were a pleasure to work with and made a challenging project much less daunting. I look forward to working with Centerstance when further upgrades are required.

I have had the privilege of working with Joel and Brandi from Centerstance while at PayScale. Our company has definitely thrown some challenging scenarios at their team, and they have consistently come through with solutions that have significantly benefited our company and clients. Their creativity not only with Salesforce, but also with the other tools we use on a daily basis, helped integrate disparate information sources using both cloud and desktop components. Centerstance has saved us thousands of dollars as well as many days of frustration with their innovative problem solving skills. I highly recommend Centerstance to anyone who wants quick, inventive results at a very good value.

One of the primary reasons for selecting Salesforce as our CRM solution was Centerstance’s pre-sale proposal. Centerstance took the time needed to understand our business and provided the best solution to meet our business needs. Their solution not only replaced a home grown CRM system, but provided us with integration with our ERP system and streamlined many of our processes in Marketing, Customer Services and Sales. Centerstance was critical to the success of our implementation project – as they were able to pull together several different sales divisions to agree upon a single solution/process for using SFDC. Their review of our business objectives and processes resulted in the creation of several custom objects – which facilitated a successful adoption by 150 users. Throughout the project we found Centerstance’s professional staff to be courteous, hard working and on time with scheduled tasks. With their help, we were able to rollout Salesforce on time and on budget. We are confident and very satisfied with Centerstances services and would not hesitate to engage them for future projects.

King Retail Solutions is a Design/Fabrication/Installation company specializing in interior retail decor. We had a very small dataset of leads and customers to migrate into Salesforce, and a modest amount of customizations needed to capture the data we want to track.  Centerstance was helpful, knowledgeable and very easy to work with. Our implementation took less than a month, and Centerstance was very responsive and proactive during that time, so that we were able to go "live" without a hitch. Great job!

Regence is a non profit holding company for Regence BlueShield in WA, Regence BlueShield in Idaho, Regence BCBS in Oregon and Utah. We entered into a fixed bid agreement with Centerstance to support our project to implement Salesforce.com for managing our front end processes (lead generation to membership install) for our Individual line of business across all four states. This included lead generation, sales support, broker support, underwriting, and membership. This work included business process review and optimization, basic configuration of SFDC to support the business process, custom configuration and code, interface development to Regence systems, testing support, training, knowledge transfer and post deployment support. Our project was delivered on time and on budget. We found Centerstance leadership very involved in this effort and we had excellent communication and governance processes that helped resolve issues quickly as they became known. The fixed bid approach helped both of us develop clear expectations on deliverables and problem resolution that served us well. Centerstance provided skilled resources that understood Salesforce.com and offered recommendations and advise on selecting key partners that were needed as we developed complex integrations to numerous backend systems at Regence.

I have been working with CenterStance for almost 4 years and have been very pleased with their project management and implementation of Salesforce.com. We have leveraged CenterStance on several projects including initial setup, enhancements, and an integration with Oracle databases to feed data daily into Salesforce.com.  Additionally, CenterStance has been accommodating and has worked within our budgets and timelines. They quickly understand our business, variations among teams and departments, and process challenges, then provide suggestions and solutions that best fit our needs.  CenterStance is an extension of our team and I consult them first whenever I have questions about functionality or best practices. We have a great working relationship and I can always rely on CenterStance to deliver on projects.

We are a professional service organization that needs to track very specific information on an annualized basis while managing sales, opportunities, projects and statutory deadlines. Centerstance really grabbed the details of our needs and came up with a great solution, which we implemented in 2002.  The service they provided was excellent and timely. We were up and running with Salesforce in no time at all. Included in our negotiated costs with Centerstance was offsite training for all of our employees. The classes were comprehensive and resulted in enthusiastic employee users.  We are a return client; last year we negotiated a study in which we requested that Centerstance utilize the newest features of Salesforce. Centerstance gave us an excellent presentation using a sandbox model they put together. Their ideas were just what we needed to move our usage into the future.

Centerstance was instrumental in assisting with a number of initiatives within our company that has saved our employees countless hours of work. They've streamlined our business process allowing us to reduce our customers response wait time from days down to a matter of hours. The employees at Centerstance were extremely patient and took the time to truly understand our business and the end goals of the project. I appreciate the effort they made to provide a number of solutions to meet our needs and budget. Their deep knowledge of Salesforce and their ability to recommend out of the box solutions, when at all possible, made it much easier to support the app upon rollout. We look forward to working with Centerstance on future projects.

Miyachi Unitek implemented Salesforce.com in March of 2004 and has been working with Centerstance on a project basis since that time. Every job is handled efficiently and professionally, coming in on-time and on-budget. What impresses me most, though, is the integrity exhibited by Nick and his team. On more than one occasion, they've reviewed my requirements and come back to me with a suggestion on how I might solve the problem myself using workflow rules or a formula field, thus saving valuable consulting dollars for bigger, more complicated projects. For this, I am truly thankful and loyal, and will continue to work with Centerstance for all my CRM integration needs!

We originally rolled out Salesforce in 2005, Nick and team were very responsive, professional, met and exceeded all of our business requirements.  Being a healthcare company we don’t sell widgets – the Centerstance team took the time to understand our business and then customized Salesforce to meet our business needs.  Our company has evolved over the past four years and we have used Ventus for several projects. They always found ways to meet our complicated business processes!

In 2007, our company asked Centerstance Solutions to be our partner and help in our implementation of SFDC. From day one, I was impressed with their level of knowledge, not only about SFDC, but also best practices, which is a tremendous help for a company, new to an application. They have been extremely responsive, and in many occasions, I received faster response time from Jeannette and Anthony, than my own team. Even Nick was accessible whenever I needed his help! They were truly an extension of my team, and never tried to nickel and dime me, even when I had last minute modifications to the implementation plan or to the requirements. To this day, they are part of my team and I rely on them. And no, this is not a paid advertisement, just the words of a grateful partner.

We have worked with Centerstance Solutions from the very beginning of our association with Salesforce.com to completely customize our application and then to add special features that allow the staff to effectively and efficiently process large amounts of customer feedback. Nick and his staff work with us as a team to assess the situation, offer solutions and then implement those solutions on time and within budget. The training for our staff is excellent and I do not hesitate to recommend using Centerstance for your needs.

Centerstance has been a Salesforce.com consulting partner for Harrah's Entertainment since 2005. Nick Yarymovych and the Centerstance team has been instrumental in the implementation of many different projects that have been a success over the years. Centerstance has always taken the time to understand the nuances of our business, which is reflected in their recommended solutions. We have been very pleased with the work Centerstance has done for us and we plan to continue using them in the future.

As a quickly growing company, Sysrepubilc began to lose track of its customer contacts and follow ups. Centerstance quickly and painlessly assessed our needs and provided a detailed proposal on how they would configure a solution for our needs. Their simple methodology and flexible requirements gathering techniques fit our schedule and budget. We were up and running in a matter of a few weeks with all the training and follow up support you would hope for. Given our compliex multi currency and multi national business, we were pleasantly surprised at how smoothly the implementation went. The follow up support to tweak configurations and reporting was greatly appreciated. Overall, we felt that there is great value in this experienced and motivated solutions implementor and we plan on calling on Centerstance again as our business grows.

As a diverse software company, we had a number of different product and services offerings. Centerstance was able to help us come up with a product design strategy that is easy to use by our sales team and also provides the opportunity and customer reports that we need.  The Centerstance team was extremely knowledgeable about SFC, but more importantly they took the time to understand what we needed to get accomplished before they recommended a and approach and solution.

Centerstance was stategic in customizing our Salesforce application. There challenges included working to compliment existing company processes built over 60 years in the business. in addition, we automated our contract processing system into the Salesforce CRM platform.  Despite these challenges Centerstance was able to meet our deadline and overall budget.

reviews.Comment: I used an intermediary person to project manage and communicate with our Salesforce volunteer. Overall, the project was not a good experience, but I do NOT blame that on this volunteer, it was a communication issue with the project manager. I did not get to work very closely with this volunteer but am always appreciative of people who give of their time.

CommerceCX was instrumental in getting our nonprofit up and going on salesforce while asking about our unique needs as an arts organization. Helping to reorganize our current donors and create personalized pages to help track our unique projects. CommerceCX put together complete onboarding documentation and a deep dive into our personal needs.

It was a great and collaborative experience. I received the support needed on specific and agreed scope and was also able to receive recommendations for alternative and sustainable solutions. The partner was very diligent and taught me how to use some features in a very friendly way. Thank you so much!

I had no idea of the concept of how this program would fit our organization. This team was amazing in crafting the scope but more importantly they allowed me to grow with the work. There were certain requests I didn't know to ask for until we got further into the project. They were able to incorporate my learning curve to deliver an amazing product.

As a nonprofit, we are not Salesforce experts. CommerceCX consultants took the time to explain how to get what we needed out from Salesforce without overwhelming us with jargon. We now have more systems in place with enhancements they've configured. As a bonus, the consultants shared some very valuable tools for Salesforce that will help us moving forward with our NPSP instance. A great experience working with CommerceCX!
