reviews.Comment: Great team, very personable and helpful. They worked extremely well with our internal developer to get a good result. Kept me informed of progress and next steps. Kept to their commitments. Overall, a pleasure to deal with.

Keno had an issue where a subscriber who was on an exclusion list was sent a survey from a separate platform. We worked with dxc on a solution where we now import all data from the survey platform into marketing cloud so that the survey sends will now always have the correct suppressions lists included.  DXC completed the very complex data import and contact filtering solution design, the technical build and assisted in the UAT.  DXC are always extremely detailed, precise, and professional.

Partner had a strong focus on quality outcomes and delivering this project on what was a condensed timeline. Quality team overall, strong project management ensuring clarity of progress, and where needed, really jumped in for some heavy lifting to deliver on time.
DXC team has been highly professional, they did a great job in delivering the solution and also supporting the BAU handover and supporting Change management.
Yes of course!!

Overall our experience with DXC was positive. The team assembled with great and they were responsive to changing conditions we experienced during the execution of the project. They were also very good at dealing with serious inefficiencies and problems that were introduced because of realities on our side. The end product was exactly what we had asked for and went beyond it in many areas. On a personal note I very much enjoyed working the people that were on our team at DXC and they gave us a tremendous amount of support.  Our team was very inexperienced with Salesforce, but we had grand plans for what we wanted to achieve. The biggest issue that we faced was that the "discovery" phase was not detailed enough to uncover all of the pitfalls in the approach we were taking. We had only really sketched out the high level business requirements. I feel that in an ideal world DXC would have recognized this and extended the discovery phase to make it more thorough.  I think that if we had been ready to provide a layer of requirements to them one level down from the business requirements they could have executed them perfectly. As we were not as well prepared as this and the discovery did not tease out potential issues, we did face delays and a number of unforeseen issues.  It should be noted that DXC were agile and effective at dealing with these issues as they arose.  We faced an issue whereby the change request mechanism was not utilized properly. This resulted in multiple people on our side randomly firing off new requirements, and DXC would build them. This led to scope creep and delays. Essentially this was our fault, but the guard rails were not there on the DXC side to stop us from doing this.  Despite these issues the tool was successfully delivered to us and the project was a success. Additionally, DXC ended up doing a lot more work than the original scope suggested but the project still came in at a price that was within the original scope of work agr

From the outset, DXC approached our engagement with the mindset of providing value for money, ensuring the right skill set was part of the engagement and that the scope of work was understood. The team challenged our ideas, assisted us to understand impacts of decisions and went the extra mile so we would meet our emergency timelines. As individuals - a pleasure to partner with.

Its been a great experience working with the team at DXC. Great communication making the project run smoothly and on time/budget whilst getting a great result. We have worked on a number of projects with DXC and I would highly recommend working with them.
Professional, well managed & efficient team. Prompt response & easily approachable. Looking forward to get engage with DXC technologies for future projects.
System Partners are very supportive and dependable. Forever exceeding expectations and consistently delivering first-class projects.
Very professional technic team
System Partners have been wonderful to work with. They're transparent, flexible and dedicated.
A team that is genuinely insterested in the business achieving its goals. They have achieved fantastic results through dedicated hard work and expert solution design.
DXC were easy to work with, as they got to know our product and communication was constant and effective.

We have used System Partners / DXC for a number of different projects over the past year. Great team to work with who have been able to deliver projects on time and budget. The team is able to adapt quickly and are able to understand requirements and identify the best solution for us.

We have used System Partners / DXC for a number of different projects over the past year. The team were able to deliver a successful result for our migration in a quick turnaround. Always going above & beyond our expectations.

Rajesh Tahiliani was an amazing Project Lead/Manager. Kept to the framework of the project and provided meaningful checkpoints, status update, action and problem resolution throughout the project.  The other team Members (Kalvin Rae, Pravin Shivle, Nazir Eshaq) were very competent and focused individuals who were great and collaborating with us as a business, always so friendly and respectful and helpful. It's so great/refreshing to see a team of 'techy' people that also know how to speak to people and achieve a great outcome together! They were super patient with my team and I (who have limited experience in the design of new systems etc.).  I hope that Raj and his team members are rewarded by DXC/System Partners for this great piece of work - it has been a very positive experience for us,  Thank you. Elizabeth Billing.

DXC's extensive knowledge of Salesforce allowed them to design and build a robust platform for our audit program. DXC showed flexibility in supporting our operational requirements while trying to deliver multiple projects at the one time. I was extremely happy with the outcome of the project and the willingness to develop a product that was well above the MVP we first envisaged.
Best implementation partner we've worked with. Have and do highly recommend
Best implementation partner we've worked with. Have and do highly recommend

I was especially pleased with the level of business acumen coupled with the willingness to integrate our 'process nuances', as opposed to seeking to force a 'standard' onto our business through this process.  The rythym of the sprints and review, supported with daily stand-ups and the effective use of project boards provided a ecosystem of interaction that allowed me (and I hope everyone) to sleep easy at night.  Geoff

System Partners were the epitome of professionalism using their experience, creativity, and knowledge of our organisations' role and character to guide our decisions and produce a project tracking tool that delivers exactly what we need. The team was dedicated, thorough and met our very tight timeframes with time to spare. We were thoroughly impressed with System Partners' project management as well as their technical expertise. This allowed us to be flexible in the scoping and implementation our project which is exactly how we needed it to be. I would recommend System Partners to any organisation, but particularly those that don't have a clear idea of what they want, or in-house technical expertise, as System Partners easily fills those gaps.
Highly recommend System Partners. Worked very hard to understand exactly what we were trying to achieve and executed it flawlessly in a very short time frame. 5 stars!

Maarten, Ian and the rest of the team at System Partners have a great understanding of client requirements in Financial Services – that’s why we selected them as a development partner for Concep Pty Ltd. Damian Purvis.

reviews.Comment: Due to Brimit’s extensive experience in Salesforce, we’ve selected them to work on the managed package for our customer, a USA-based startup. We found Brimit to be professional, responsive, and dependable. We are pleased to recommend Brimit as a reliable partner for long-term cooperation.

These guys (Brimit) have a good team ready to solve problems. The key leadership is bright and active, which helps grease the execution cogs. We seamlessly role week-to-week, making measurable, predictable progress. What else do you need?

Brimit were happy and flexible to work with us on this project and to use whatever project tools worked best for us. They understood the project complexity and helped us map the Salesforce fields to the new target system. They also helped add value in bring back data and erro checking from the sync. The Project hit an issue when we discovered we could not write to the targets custom fields using JSON. The project was quickly re-aligned and changed over to XML and Brimit quickly and seamlessly changed staff to accommodate this.  The team are good communicators, are polite and professional and will add ideas and challenges which helps make the project better.

reviews.Comment: Very agile and flexible support, and great insight on analyses of projects etc. Always providing longsighted solutions, and that is perfect

Mooza have been key to us in this project of implementing SF CPQ, and really took in to consideration our special needs during the full length of the project. We mutually decided to go for a very agile approach on the project, and due to that and excellent work we ended up saving hours that could be used for further development. Also appreciate their flexibility and transparency making our decicions in the process very easy!
Mooza has been very solution oriented and always quick in their responses. They have a lot of knowledge, and great at project management.
Mooza is a very professional agency, quick response times and great results

Great team to work with. They do take their time to understand the industry and your business which is the best benefit. They do not hesitate to challenge your mindset and provide valuable feedback on both business operations and implications of SF setup on them

Mooza is a great partner to work with. They have build a real relationship between our companies to make sure they understand not only the way Salesforce supposed to work but also what are our specific industry and company needs are. We are working together already over a year on a wide set of products both on maintenance level and rollout/implementation level and really happy about our selection.
Mooza has some excellent people, whom we are thrilled to have working with us on an ongoing basis through a Managed Services contract as well as helped us with an MVP type project.

Mooza were engaged to support us as we introduced a new team and their processes to Salesforce.  From the outset Mooza were always available with strong communication whilst actively seeking out collaborative opportunities to ensure the solution met the business requirements.  Ultimately, the end-to-end journey from initiating the project to implementing the solution was a positive one and we are more than happy with the outcome for our business.  I would definitely recommend partnering with Mooza to support your Salesforce needs!
Mooza understand our needs and always offer practical solutions. We look forward to continue our collaboration with them in the future.

After an initial in-depth conversation we felt Mooza really understood our needs and came back with practical solutions. Communication was very efficient and clear and we felt very involved at every stage. We hope to engage Mooza with further project after this positive experience.

Mooza was our implementation partner of choice for the rollout of Salesforce. It's been an ambitious project against tight deadlines with all project meetings and workshops taking place remotely. In the end, Mooza delivered the MVP in time and to our expectations.

Mooza has proven to be an excellent Salesforce partner. After previously investing heavily with a Salesforce partner in Australia and not achieving the results we were hoping for it was refreshing to engage with Mooza, get Salesforce working well and then deploy CPQ. Despite many of the people in our team that Mooza work with being in Australia and the Philippines and the Mooza team being based in Europe they have done an excellent job of managing communication, meetings etc. I can highly recommend Mooza to others looking to get the most out of their investment with Salesforce.

We used Mooza to build an maintain a custom business reporting system on the Salesforce platform using sales, service and communities. I would choose Mooza for the job again, based on their professionalism, excellent communication and implementation skills.

We used Mooza's services for migration and implementation of our CRM system to Salesforce.  They helped us with deployment, customisation, integrations, support and guidance to leverage Salesforce for our business. They have vast knowledge and expertise in what they do and would definitely recommend them for anyone looking for similar services. We look forward to continue our collaboration with them in the future.
Propose new unexpected solutions explaining their benefits. Quick response to requests.

Everything went will Mooza - they analyzed our requirements, offered various solutions, we picked one and got the solution delivered in a relatively short time. There was no problem at any stage and we're happy with the outcome.

We have been using Managed Services from Mooza in the past 6 months with Petr leading our projects. He and the team has been very attentive to our often short deadlines and put the hours where the work is done. These two values gives you a lot of Salesforce build for the money and an agile setup.

We were looking to use SalesForce Sales-, Service-, and Community Cloud as an all-in-one mean to deliver our own consulting services to clients in a scalable way, which meant modifying and adding to the salesforce platform to serve our needs.  Mooza has proven to be an invaluable partner in our project by being knowledgable, fast and consistent in their work.  Most importantly, I value their persistent efforts to deliver the *right* solution for us. Projects are discussed and questioned to make sure we will end up where we want to be.

Mooza helped us from decision about new CRM system selection to successful implementation. We really appreciated work with highly skilled implementation team that immediately understood what we would like to achieve. It saved us a lot time and money at the end. I would really recommend Mooza to anyone who is looking for the new CRM system.

We have been working with Mooza for about a year and they were with us from the start of our project of evaluating, building and implementing Salesforce. The basic Salesforce plattform can, of course, be implemented by the company in-house, but will you find time to do it!? Looking back at our journey, we would not have been up and running yet and our platform would not have been suited to our needs! We have added lots of customizations and without Mooza, we would not have known about them or been able to implement them ourselves. That's why we have decided to continue working with Mooza even after implementation of Sales Cloud is almost finished.
Good cooperation during the implementation phase. Quick response to our requests. A desire to start a solution in the world of Salesforce. It is not only muse … it is Mooza :-)
We received support for master data maintenance. We had a close connection to the developer and we were always informed.
Mooza can give me an opinion on development so honestly that sometimes I pay less than I planned. I appreciate fairness and experience.

Cloud Plus had previously used a Salesforce partner in Australia and we didn't feel that we got the engagement and value we were hoping for. As we have a presence in Prague we decided to engage Mooza and have a great experience since. They have assisted with tuning Salesforce to our requirements and rolling out Salesforce CPQ, which is now in full production. I can highly recommend Zdeněk and his team who have worked in well with our team in Australia and Manila aside from any engagement here in Prague.

Mooza has been very responsive throughout the collaboration and guided the projects to meet our business objectives within the timeframe.  A service agreement with them is very affordable and would meet the day-to-day Salesforce upgrade needs of most organizations!
Good communication, bringing new designs and solutions. Overall, I am very satisfied with the cooperation.
Mooza is my 1st choice for the future projects. I can strongly recommend.

Mooza is an incredibly helpful and thoughtful partner. All members of Mooza team helped us from the very beginning to analyse and find solutions to very complex scenarios we have in the company. At first we were implementing automation enrolment processes and there were a lot of parameters that had to be considered. Mooza took care of all of them. Their commitment to searching and finding cost effective and custom solutions to customer's needs was clear from the first meeting and until the implementation of the initial project. They communicated efficiently and effectively and took care of new feature requests from our side that appeared during the implementation. We will be continuing our cooperation with Mooza and look forward to making our company's processes better with their team. Be prepared to invest time into working with their team to understand your needs. But it probably depends on the specifics of the project. We are happy we have started our Salesforce journey with Mooza!

Mooza, was really helpful getting our Salesforce implementation going. From consulting on hot to implement the sales process to the technical implementation the guys were very helpful and quick to act!

We had set-up Salesforce using a different consulting partner to Mooza. After using Salesforce for a year, we had quite a few loose ends which we needed to sort out and I was looking for a consulting partner who could do this for us. I was recommended Mooza and after a very informative web meeting, I decided to go with Mooza.  The Mooza team has helped us with quotations, our product structure, reporting, dashboards, document handling, campaigns, etc.  I have been very impressed by the fact that they are very structured, I get continuous and quick feed-back on progress and they are very good at explaining the solution/-s they are proposing. I also really like the fact that the time reporting and billing is very clear and I get a monthly status report on hours used and the remaining hours in the current contract. Not only are the co-workers very competent in their field, but they are always very positive and friendly.  For me, and I have been working with quite a few consulting firms in various fields, Mooza delivers 5/5.

We decided to implement Salesforce in our sales and marketing department in 2019. We had no experience whatsoever with Salesforce so we needed a partner who could challenge, guide, and implement the solution, where the first part was extremely important to us. We needed a partner who was easy to do business with and was able to understand our scale up business. We found all that in Mooza. We received valued guides on how to structure our SF solution to fit our requirements now but also prepare for the future. The design and project and implementation were led by Mooza and adjusted accordingly to over changing requirements. The solution was delivered on time and budget.

Qualifed and very proffesional Salesforce Partner. We have only been using Mooza by remote services, but it actually felt like they were presence and physical at our location. They have a high degree of servicemindedness and understood our business needs and also inspired us to do things with standard configurations and avoid speciel setups. I can only warmly give my recommendations to use Mooza.
Quick response time, in-depth technical and procedural knowledge, good communication and fun to work with - that's summing up mooza.

Even though I had my doubts implementing one of the most important solutions for our company by distance and in another language, Moozas team did an excellent job in making me feel safe the job would be done in great fashion. Hats off!

The Mooza Team has been an excellent partner for multiple projects. Extremely passionate about their work and the goals of their partner, they helped us achieve our goals and more! We were able to to reach our deadlines and avoid more cost due to their in-depth knowledge.

I sent Mooza a fairly difficult question regarding customization of the lightning interface and they called me back really quickly and talked me though the problem, and suggested a much more efficient way of doing things. They are technically very knowledgeable and very friendly at the same time

We had a great experience when we where recommended Mooza for implementing Pardot into SF. They are really into their knowledge and where driving the process forward. We used Quip as a collaboration tool together, and video meetings - and that form worked fine, even with our external resource. We will use Mooza again

I had the pleasure to work with Mooza for our partner community. Besides their professionalism and efficiency in delivering the service, the team has been always available for inputs and feedback. They managed to tailor the project according to our needs and open possibilities for future growth in our business.

We felt very confident with Mooza's knowledge and expertise from day one. They really took the time to understand our needs and work with us to achieve the results we wanted, improving both the productivity and effectiveness of our organisation. They were accommodating of any changes we had during the project. Our budget was limited and they delivered our project within that budget and agreed timeframe. As they are in a different country, they were able to complete the work remotely with meetings and training held on-line at agreed times.

I have setup most of our salesforce account myself with the help of support. But when I started to come to more complicated setup that support couldnt help with and was more then the knowledge of our salesforce rep we needed help.  Our salesforce rep recommended me for mooza since they have been long within the salesforce system before opening up consultansy firm.  The service is great and they dont just help solve issues but also recommend best way for do it to make it a great longterm solution.  Efficient and very helpfull and cares about the best end result. Very happy with the result!

Partner: Navint: Salesforce CPQ & Billing, Lead-to-Revenue Transformation Experts

Salesforce Certified Marketing Cloud Email Specialist

reviews.Comment: The IBM Implementation feature team for Lesotho was on point with regards to their delivery. They successfully delivered the Customer Self-service solution allowing customers to engage the Voice Branch Team through a channel of their choice – Phone, E-mail, WhatsApp or Live Chat. The solution offers intelligent omni channel routing of cases to available agents as well as knowledge articles with FAQs . The team really went the extra mile to help End-User training & support resulting in an overall successful project delivery.

The BlueWolf team did an outstanding job managing our project. They were able to manage several internal IT challenges and organization changes. Also, they were able to integrate with different ERP systems and complex business rules throughout our divisions. Special thank you to Josselain Prost who always went the extra mile to ensure our project was one of the most successful, delivered the expected business value and return on investment.
Strong methodology for translating the needs and organizing delivery. Deep knowledge on all SalesForce App Good relationship with SalesForce Client oriented Transparent

Products: Sales Portal & Community Portal  Key Business Outcomes: * Manage quotas by sales rep, end to end order tracking, order approval automation, better stock visibility, increase productivity. , integrated solution across key business functions.   KPIs * Increase in TM productivity, reduction in admin costs, improved CSAT, improved collections, reduced ageing.  Well Done: Project Management, Communication, Customer Engagement, Solutioning Skills  Areas of Improvement: Resource Management/Attrition, Change Request (turn around time)   Overall: Quite happy with the partner, team & the implementation methodology
The program manager that was assigned to us was world class, and essential to our project going off successfully.

The experience with Blue Wolf was excelent. The team was very engage, profesional, friendly and efective. We already want to continue working with them for future improvements and projects. Great work!!

The team is pro-active and very engaged to find the right solutions for us. The quality of devs was very good. The team was very thorough in accompanying us during the tests. The Solution Designs was complete and detailed which makes the solution easier to maintain in time. Thanks again to the whole team.

7Summits onboarded to our project directly from an Ignite engagement with the Salesforce team around our Employee Experience strategy. We needed a solution that provided a robust platform enabling learning, productivity, and collaboration to surpass employee expectations. This is where 7Summits became the partner of choice based on their expertise in the Salesforce products driving Employee Experience within organizations. The advantage 7Summits brought to the project is that many of the business requirements were able to be fulfilled via the IP they have already developed. This made it easy to work declaratively and focus time and budget on key customizations to enhance based on our unique business needs. Additionally, 7Summits is a partner that will bring you ideas, capabilities and solutions that you didn’t even know where possible. As a partner, they delivered on-time and on-budget, via a project team of experts that supported and challenged us to success.
Working with 7Summits is one of the best collaborations for product implementations I've had in my 20-year career. Highly recommend.

7summits is truly one of a kind in its ability to understand their customers business and technology needs, put a team in place to build out the desired functionality, and manage the engagement to ensure successful outcomes. They employ world-class resources that care as much about your product as the customer does and are truly incredible people to work with.

We selected 7Summits for their broad Community expertise and guidance on industry and platform best practices - and their project approach with the novel Tollgate step. They were solid partners and the strong collaboration enabled us to complete our community migration and deliver a complete redesign on time and budget.
Very strong implementation team, with great skills and knowledge. Went above and beyond to help us deliver a good MVP product within a 10-week timeframe.
Seeking first to understand and listen to our global needs was a key to a successful dicovery. This helped us build a strong foundation for the use of the tool for years to come.

The team had a very good understanding of our objectives and business stakes, they are proactive and very quick to find solutions to our issue. The team has been very engaged on keeping our high data security level on this project, which is very important to us. They have been committed to find solutions on tools which were not supposed to be dependent on their expertise but were interfaced with Salesforce. It was a pleasure to work with the whole team on this project ! They had all the presentation and soft skills to stand at our side in front of our partners. Thank you again for your commitment.

7Summits has been an excellent partner on the Salesforce communities platform.  In my opinion, one of their best strengths is their willingness to push back on business requests to build a feature as-is, and instead to go deeper and look at the root process that is trying to be solved to come up with more sustainable solutions rather than building exactly what is asked.

We engaged 7Summit after completing an employee experience ignite session with Salesforce. We chose 7Summits because of their expertise in the community space, design-first approach, and bolt solutions. We were not disappointed with this engagement, we spent a good amount of time working with the business team and designing a community that works for usability and will enhance our employee experience. Looking forward to the build process!

7Summits not only provided the technical expertise our company required to migrate our online community to Salesforce, but also provided guidance for the direction of our online community scope and launch. A migration project such as this can uncover surprises during the design and deployment phases, 7Summits worked well with us to address these items to minimize the risk, be flexible in their support and keep our project on track.

We sought to rollout a new PRM system in record time and had an amazing experience with 7Summits. I had worked with them in a prior company as well. Appreciate the transparency, focus and diligence. Couldn't have built this massive ecosystem without their expertise.
Great partner, very involved and expertise.

It has been a pleasure working with the IBM team. Torrance Jones and Dalton LLyod were key contributors to the over all success, as well as the developers. IBM stepped up and help move the project forward with key contributors to ensure success on a tight timeline.
very good work and follow up about our project. Nicolas is very reactive, proactive and efficient. Thanks

We brought in 7Summits to help us re-design our customer support community (client facing). They were incredibly organized, professional, and genuinely a pleasure to work with from kickoff through post go-live support.  Each team member was well versed in their particular area of expertise, very open to feedback, and quick to make changes when deemed necessary. I'd recommend keeping an open mind and allowing the team from 7S to be creative in their solutioning, to get the most out of the partnership. Overall, we were extremely happy with the end result and would highly recommend their services to anyone considering.
Group of "A" players, well rounded with deep Salesforce Knowledge. Very accountable, great sense of ownership in delivering what they commit to deliver.

7Summits is the premier Experience Cloud Partner in my opinion. After working with a couple of other vendors in this space I believe 7Summits product knowledge and quality in resources and deliverables sets them apart from the others. In the 3+ years that I have worked with 7Summits with 2 clients now they have delivered quality work and results.

We brought on the 7Summits team to relaunch our Salesforce CPQ instance and prepare for some future financial systems integrations. Our use case of CPQ and the complexity of our pricing required the 7Summits team to do some custom work for us.  The biggest strength of the 7Summits team in our experience is the depth of their discovery. If you are working on a project that involves aligning many stakeholders and mapping new or existing process into the system, they will be a good partner for that.  The technical architects are very good and knowledgeable, though the learning curve for a complex Salesforce instance should be worked into your project timeline.  Where we have run into some difficulty with 7Summits in the past is with scoping - the line between what is in and out of scope can be very fine. I would also encourage other companies looking at 7Summits as a prospective vendor to make sure that the 7Summits team has thoroughly reviewed and audited all connecting points in production before pushing anything live. For example, reviewing any formula fields or validations that may be impacted by your work, but aren't directly a part of your project.

7Summits team summarizes the difference between a partner and a vendor.  - Their team members were very well prepared, understood our business model, asked valuable questions and was always ahead of us. - They collaborated well with my inhouse team of business stakeholders, product owners, developers, and administrators. - Their technical architects were very knowledgeable of SFDC Community cloud, service cloud, and always provided us with various technical options, pros and cons. - They advised us of risks to the project way ahead of time, and presented options to mitigate the risk. They have made an art out of status reporting and budget tracking. - During implementation, they were always available irrespective of the time and day.  Suggestion for engaging with 7Summits: Be prepared ahead with your requirements for their workshops. Include them as a partner in your planning process. Make sure you plan your UAT well in advance, in addition to their QA and E2E testing.  Overall, very satisfied to have found 7Summits for a project that is very important for us: developing a new digital experience for our consumers.

Be prepared and be experts in your space because this team comes ready to work. If you are not prepared you will be wasting money having these guys waiting to work.  7Summits is a true expert firm at what they do. They know the ins and outs of SFDC and if you can teach them your business and industry, they will come to the table with solutions and different ways to think about things.  We used a full 7S team and all roles managed their aspects well and the overall delivery of the project was excellent.

7Summits delivery process was very effective. Our project was delivered on time and to scope. This was our first communities project and they led us through successfully with continuous communication, coaching and tenacity. They knew the definition of success and achieving it was never in question. I would highly recommend working with them.

We have been using the Twitter component for a number of years in our community of over 1500 without issue until a SF update was made. I reached out to them for support and was happy to get immediate, actionable support from them. Turns out you should stay on top of new releases! Thanks Phil for your responsiveness.

Working with 7Summits to migrate our existing partner tool to a Salesforce community was not an easy task. We previously used a custom platform with a supplier for more than a decade of build and design. 7Summits was able to design and build a portal for our channel partners that not only meets our brand guidelines, but also gives our partners valuable information in a snapshot. This helps our customer base make informed decisions and we can track our data in a thought leading way.

Overall, we were very happy with the partnership we had with 7S. They were very knowledgeable, easy to work with, and helpful through the whole process. They were even willing to be available at a drop of a hat, especially as we were preparing to go-live!

Our resources and the 7Summits team meshed well from the very beginning. We worked hard, had some fun along the way, and produced great results. All 7Summits team members were highly skilled, very personable, and always respectful. We couldn't have asked for a better partnership!

We engaged 7Summits to deliver Salesforce Communities within a new org to manage Tableau's customer community. We had a strong, collaborative and partnering relationship with 7S throughout the project. 7S demonstrated strong Salesforce product expertise and a program delivery methodology that worked well. As part of the solution, we purchased 7S custom developed components that enabled us to achieve parity with our previous solution. Overall, our experience was high quality and I'm looking forward to working with them again in the future.
Communicate well. Very professional. Knowledgeable. Easy to Work with. Accommodating.

Working with BW was not only a pleasure during the project but still is as we have a very good relationship and keep in contact to see where we can help each other! Exactly what a partnership is supposed to be!
7Summits was very thorough in their approach to rolling us out on Salesforce, and I couldn't be happier with the result
Excellent business partner for us, definitely a leader in their field. The best consulting team I've ever worked with.

As we launched the Snowflake Partner Network (PRM) to fuel our channel business, we needed a world-class partner. We chose 7Summits due to their industry reputation, their reputation as a Salesforce Platinum Partner, their vast library of Lightning Accelerators and Bolts, and their unique community experience-centric design team and implementation capabilities on the Salesforce Community Cloud. 7Summits has not let us down and remains our go-to partner fueling our rapidly expanding partner eco-system's capabilities. They're smart, they work hard, they run fast and they're fun. Just the partner we needed at this time in our company's history to fuel Snowflake's future success.

Replacing our legacy CRM with Salesforce was a big undertaking. Our agents worked in call centers around the globe and despite the benefits of the new solution they were change averse. IBM did a great job in helping us manage change, facilitate training across regions, and promote adoption. My advice is don't underestimate the human element when planning business transformation projects.
Very good knowledge on the platform, clear methodology, excellent sense of customer relationship.

We've had the pleasure of working with 7Summits for several projects over the past couple of years and always look forward to their technology solutions to help us realize our vision to be the nation's leading collaborative in robotics and workforce innovation. We look forward to working with them down the road as well!

7S is a great partner who operates with a high level of integrity. They're engaged at every step and have quickly resolved and issues in the most professional way. As with all projects there have been challenges but we've consistently improved on our ability to execute over the past couple years. I would highly recommend using them!

7Summits is one of the best vendors I've had the opportunity to work with. They are honest, transparent and work hard to understand requirements prior to submitting a bid. Everything we discussed was delivered according to schedule and budget.
Excellent service and knowledge of the platform. Team did a great job managing our scope creep, yet still providing many opportunities for enhancements while staying on time and on budget.

This partner continues to be a valued and trusted partner. Even when our own internal timelines changed, they were more than accommodating to our schedule. The team enjoys working with 7 Summits very much - and I anticipate we will continue to do a lot of great work together!
Perfect delivrery

Bluewolf is excellent at helping to steer you in the right direction for your short and long term needs. Best practices and the customer's use case are always top of mind. They understand that your success is their success. Partnering with them is always a great experience!

Early in our project, we collectively determined that some of the original deliverables needed to be modified. Bluewolf was very flexible in offering suggestions to accommodate our budget, timeline, and business priorities so that our goals were still met.  They answered our questions with high degree of certainty and expertise. There was only one time where they needed to go back and do some research. We were provided a response the next day.
Very good team, very good training support, this project is just "perfect"
Project realized with a very important backlog. Just 2 points: Meeting with business can be more simple and prepared Regression test must be better.
Good project, in time.

The implementation of our Salesforce Community platform was essential to our member reach as a nationally reaching organization. Working with the fantastic team at 7Summits enabled us to set the foundation of our membership community platform and we continue to use 7Summits for all of our integration needs. They certainly helped us build our vision!

Working with 7Summits has been a breath of fresh air. In addition to their technical expertise and timeliness, the overall project management was stellar, start to finish. There were no surprises, regular and thorough communication, and a professional, yet comfortable attitude the entire way. It felt like working with professionals at the top of their game, the way it should be when it comes to Salesforce development. Highly recommend.
7Summits has a rare blend of strong skills in strategy, UX design, development and client expectation management. It was a pleasure working with them throughout our project.

Our engagement experience with 7Summits was the best I have had in my 10+ years working on the platform. There are many vendors who have the technical expertise and knowledge to just complete the given requirements but what differentiates 7Summits was their ability to connect with the us to truly understand what we are trying to achieve, partner on solutions that set us up for future success, and simply put their resources truly took pride in delivering the most innovative solution possible. Our project wasn't just another project to them in a list of many. Their people made the difference in making this the most successful project I have been a part of. I welcome the opportunity to work with them again.

I have worked in partnership with 7Summits on many projects since 2011. They continue to stay WAY ahead of the curve and serve as my strategic partner and guide to help me transform the businesses for whom I work. They deliver nothing short of excellence and are a partner of the highest caliber. I would highly recommend 7Summits for any transformation project.

Bluewolf provided a team of exceptional professionals to work alongside the business partners and our IT Salesforce COE to develop a complex contract management, pricing and governance process. Their ability to quickly grasp the business process we had in place and the process pain points propelled the project from concept into solution-based development in less than two weeks. This allowed us to meet the tight timeline for the project. Their adaptability and responsiveness when questions were posed, or changes were requested, was astounding. I felt like they were my personal IT solution team. I highly recommend working with Bluewolf to solve challenging issues in short order.

I have worked in partnership with 7Summits on many projects since 2011. They continue to stay WAY ahead of the curve and serve as my strategic partner and guide to help me transform the businesses for whom I work. They deliver nothing short of excellence and are a partner of the highest caliber. I would highly recommend 7Summits for any transformation project.

Over the years, I've worked with many different vendors covering a wide range of engagements. While many vendors will claim that they are interested in establishing a deep collaborative partnership, 7Summits is one of the few that has truly have delivered on this promise. During the sales process, they were very engaged in understanding our goals and were very willing to work with us to establish contract terms that met our needs. Their project management team was outstanding and a pleasure to work with during the entire six month engagement. Additionally, their technical and user interface resources were of the highest caliber and always went above and beyond to ensure the success of our project. Finally, I was very impressed by the management and administrative team at 7Summits. They showed genuine interest in making sure that we were highly satisfied throughout the entire process.  I would highly recommend that you consider 7Summits for your next Salesforce project.

7Summits provided us with direction, support and agility as we developed our Employee Portal at Algonquin College this summer and fall. Their experience provided us with confidence that they could develop an impressive environment in a short time frame which was vital for this project. They were also able to provide us with guidance and knowledge when it was necessary and were able to adapt with us as needed. 7Summits established strong communication links at the onset, a process for continual and on-going communication and were always accessible. It has been a pleasure to work with them and the results have been impressive.

Let's set the scene:  Enter one community manager, who's experience with the Salesforce platform is limited to the crm. Enter one community implementation team, who knows that they're working with someone that needs a ton of help and suggestions.  Two teams enter. One Community leaves.  In short - I could not have done this without 7Summits' help. Patient and consultative, they walked me through dozens of scenarios and options and configurations with ease - gave me suggestions on how to best structure items for impact, and even offered completely changed environments when specific Salesforce options didn't seem to flow in the best manner to me.  I would literally still be trying to figure out how to change the Community header without them, and instead I'm preparing Welcome emails for inviting customers. Watching them navigate the back end of SFDC is concerning, because I know at some point they'll be done, and it'll be up to ME. They're so good, i'm WORRIED.  They're excellent at what they do, and what they do is make you look excellent to your customers or internal users of your community. I would use them again, in a heartbeat.

They are "ACE's"! Attentive to details, Collaborative, and Engaged! Great companies need great partners to do great things and 7S has been a great partner. Not only do they "get it done", we have even had fun throughout the process. Creative, technical, practical...we are SO excited about our project...and they are just as genuinely as excited as we are! We are going to get to market with something to shake up our industry and then have a great plan for the future waves that push us out in front of the competition even further.

7Summits delivered great work developing a custom Salesforce Community for employees. They have implemented great design and leveraged responsive design to support mobile platforms. 7Summits is great partner that has extensive experience in design, architecture and Saleforce1 platform. Agile project management helped to stay on the top of development tasks and on budget. Communication, responsiveness and guidance contributed to first class product. Team is easy to collaborate with and they are listening. I would recommend 7Summits to anybody with complex project.

It was an absolute pleasure to work with 7Summits on the development and launch of a custom Salesforce Community for employees. If you are looking for a collaborative partner who is agile, has deep experience in community deployments, and boasts award-winning design, look no further. The 7S project team was fantastic in terms of communication, responsiveness, guidance and output. They not only delivered an amazing product, but also supported our launch and helped us build a roadmap for future releases. This is the beginning of a valuable partnership between our organizations.

reviews.Comment: We had an excellent consulting experience with T1A: communication was polite and fast, we received necessary expertise with high-level quality. I highly recommend this partner to all Salesforce prospects and leads.

The company with deep technical and industry expertise. The team has solid techno-functional knowledge and the ability to design & implement new, highly customized solutions that may have never been delivered before. Deliverables are always on time, they do an excellent job, and I would highly recommend them.

We worked with T1A for our overall org health check and blueprint with a review on improvements around our existing Experience Cloud solution and a custom managed package app that we have been facing issues with. Overall we are very satisficed with performance of T1A team. Communication was great, always on point and professional. During the whole project scope T1A were giving us exact, precise and detailed recommendations. We are currently reviewing project findings to understand what improvements we want to work on with T1A as a follow up project. We have worked with many different providers and partners, so far T1A was the one that have delivered the most value and the one we are planning to work with in a future as well

T1A provided valuable Salesforce expertise and advices to us throughout the project, helping us to achieve our goals. They perfectly understood our business needs and proposed us the best solution. I could strongly recommend this Salesforce's partner.
The team is client-oriented and friendly. Always looking forward and offering solutions for the clients. They are also thought about risks, that we missed and offered us solutions.

reviews.Comment: They were very easy to work with and delivered what they promised on time.

Working with Cervello/Colleen was an amazing experience. She took our complex problem and was able to design a solution so simple it was beyond belief. The design provided is extremely scalable to our business needs and accounts for the many variables that our custom solution needed. We are beyond impressed and pleased with the output of this project. Thank you!

You can count on this partner to work with you to come up with an approach for the engagement to satisfy the needs of your organization. In addition, they communicate and document very well and adjust as needed. You won't be disappointed.

Great work all around on this project. We were able to bridge the gap between two of our main systems (Salesforce and Dialpad) in a way that will not only scale with the business but will also enable us to build additional functionality through declarative means. Without a Salesforce developer on staff, we wouldn't have been able to make this happen without Cervello! Thanks to Hunter and Maneesh specifically for all of their work on this one!

Ali Jameel joined our squad and was up to speed on the requirements in record time. He went above and beyond and helped our squad prepare for work ahead upon his departure. The entire squad really enjoyed working with Ali and would provide nothing but compliments to his involvement in our work.
I feel like they are more qualified than my professional service team from Salesforce.

Our data model is complex, but with the guidance from Cervello team, we could achieve all our archiving rules.   Cervello as Archiving tool, it very good, however there are certain that requires improvements such as Deployment toolkit.
Cervello is a great partner, very knowledgeable and do a very good job navigating our complex working environment.

Cervello handled the two most complex parts of this project. After initial functional testing and fixes, and through 7 more rounds of testing, we've never found a problem with the matching algorithm and return values. Cervello also proposed consolidating functionality previously dispersed over several areas, and greatly simplifying our rep's lives. It's going to be a complex new environment. I really appreciate this idea and its implementation.

Cervello is a great partner and invaluable resource. Despite many challenges during this project outside of their control they worked with us to solve every issue in a very professional and transparent way.
It was good
Very professional and a pleasure to work with.

Cervello is as good as it gets. They are professional, knowledgable and do a wonderful job of understanding the client needs and going above and beyond to provide solutions and expertise. Very impressed!

Our engagement with Cervello was one of the best consulting efforts I've been involved in over my career. They are extremely knowledgeable and had very relevant experience to help drive our project forward. I highly recommend them to others, and will definitely use them again in the future.
I've enjoyed working with everyone at Cervello. The entire team was great- responsive, helpful, engaged-- couldn't have launched our new Communities platform without them!

Cervello is a tremendous partner. They have assisted our company in adopting and rolling out trailblazing approaches to Digital Experience and Lead generation and in record setting time. They bring excellent communication and extensive experience/knowledge with Data and the Salesforce CRM to the table.

We are incredible grateful for the team at Cervello for working so closely with us to get Salesforce implemented in our organization. They were extremely hands on during the entire project and worked diligently to solve all of our problem. Our lead consultant was extremely thorough in making Salesforce work for us and our needs. Cervello came highly recommended to us and I am happy to say I would recommend them to anyone going through a Salesforce implementation.

I am all thumbs when it comes to databases. Meg DiGregory has been most helpful in guiding me through the tangled complexities of Salesforce. She has been a terrific partner to work with , I would never have been able to get pass the log in screen without her help. I appreciate her taking the time to learn about our program and her suggestions that have helped simplified the process. I admire her ability to to be totally focused on the task at hand not get flustered by my many questions. I always feel she is genuinely interested in insuring that Salesforce will be useful to our program. I can't recommend her highly enough. Mike Oliver

We are a rapidly expanding nonprofit, and our Salesforce system was set up long before we knew exactly what we would need. Carter Sartell was engaged to help us work out kinks, restructure and redesign some of our processes, and rethink some of options for us to use as we grow. In little time, she was able to help us on our development, program, and membership fronts and incorporate apps that we desperately needed set up and set up right. She was professional efficient, a great communicator and a true professional. As a nonprofit, we were so grateful to have access to such professional service! Thank you to Carter and Cervello for their help!

First of all, I'm not one to normally write reviews. However, I'm making an exception here as I can't recommend Meg DiGregory enough to help you with Salesforce. She has been advising our non-profit, The Paradigm Shift Project, to get our system up and running pro bono. We feel so lucky! Meg is highly organized, extremely skilled, and knows all the ins and outs to customize your system. Even though I haven't had much time to dedicate to the project, she has been patient, understanding, and super efficient. She has met all of our needs- and more- and is a pleasure to work with. Her expertise in this program is enabling us to use aspects of the system we never knew existed. As we met with Carter about our requirements, she was able to produce solutions in a very short time frame. We are well on our way to creating reports for our board of directors and sending pertinent information to our clients. I would highly recommend Carter and Salesforce to others.

Meg DiGregory and Carter Sartell were invaluable in getting my nonprofit organization up and running with Salesforce! They first took the time to understand our mission and vision as an organization, then guided us towards the most effective use of Salesforce to reach our objectives. They were highly dedicated, responsive, knowledgable, and overall great Salesforce implementation partners from the beginning to end. I highly recommend Cervello, and look forward to exploring future projects!

I initially started working with Cervello for a small development project within Salesforce.com. Peter Graham and Anil Tumati partnered with my team to create a truly dynamic, sustainable solution - above and beyond expectations. I've since partnered with Cervello to help optimize our integrations with Salesforce.com, roll out new solutions in additional geographies as well as taking on some of our administrative work in the absence of a full time administrator at our company. Carter Sartell was assigned as our dedicated administrator/systems analyst and was amazing! She is very thorough, reliable and trustworthy. Having the Cervello team as a support partner is a great experience.

My Cervello trainer, Meg DiGregory, was a big help to our organization. She did a great job of meeting me where I was in my knowledge of Salesforce, and helping me progress to that next level. She took the time to learn the ins and outs of our organization’s information, which really helped our sessions to be particularly useful. She even put in some time behind the scenes, building some custom reports and templates for our future use. I’m glad that we were connected.

We could not have found a better Salesforce implementation partner than Cervello. That’s because they truly are a partner, not a vendor. They take the time to understand what business processes you’re trying to automate, rather than just flying through a checklist of tasks to get through them. Cervello’s commitment to our success is outstanding and has made our Salesforce rollout a smooth and stress-free experience, knowing we had such a capable partner by our side during it. I look forward to continuing to work with them as our use of Salesforce expands, and would highly recommend them to others.

reviews.Comment: Jhustin Abeleda continues to offer steadfast support to our organization. We appreciate the quick, concise, functional assistance he brings to our every issue and created ticket.
They have several employees leave the company and that is not communicated with us - and they work on our team. I wish that we were informed before we have to ask where they have been.

My business brought in AllCloud for MSP assistance setting up Service Cloud for our Technical Support team. We'd had consulting engagements with them in the past and knew they had high Salesforce product expertise and broad industry experience.  Unfortunately this project was difficult, largely due to staffing turnover. AllCloud changed our primary technical contact (Customer Success Manager) no fewer than four times during the project. This significantly disrupted the continuity and communications, and introduced numerous delays. It was exacerbated with involvement of an additional third-party Salesforce product vendor.  While AllCloud's tech knowledge was consistently good, the risk management to cost and timeline were poor. Responses to tasks in Jira often took 1-2 weeks. As the main stakeholder I had to drive prioritization more than expected, drop lower tier deliverables, and bring in my own project manager to ensure outcomes were met.

One of the better managed services partner I have worked with in my career. They truly operate as an extension of our team. Flexible yet fair on changes, competent, communicative and willing to adapt into our working cadence & style.

We had an incredible experience with AllCloud. The team was engaged with understanding and confirming our desired outcomes from the get-go. The team was efficient, and transparent with guidance and really set us up for success. This was such an important initiative for ModMed, they really focused on delivering the right value for us. I am so happy to have worked with a quality vendor and team from AllCloud. Thank you!

We use Salesforce Knowledge to host our help center, and recently worked with AllCloud to migrate to the lightning version of this product. Our focus was to do as little customization as possible and to maximize the out-of-the-box features. Our goal was to complete the project with a help center that we could not just update, but really “reimagine” as our products and customer needs change. I think AllCloud delivered on that goal. They also delivered on time and on budget, as we have come to expect from working with them for several years.
Very professional team.

AllCloud is a well-engaged partner who completely understands our Salesforce environment. They have trained our admins to become more independent and more valuable to our user community. Issues are often resolved in minutes instead of days.

We have worked with AllCloud for several years now, beginning with our transition to Lightning. For this project, they created a custom Salesforce object for us to help us with a particular business need for which we were unable to find a good fit in the Salesforce marketplace. During the testing phase, we discovered that one of our business requirements did not meet our team’s needs. That was bad planning on our end, but AllCloud was able to make not insignificant last-minute changes for us while meeting our release deadline. This was a short-duration project, but the quality of their project management and communication was consistent with a project of much greater complexity and time.
Allcloud is an excelent resource to utilize and can assure your maximizing your investment with Salesforce highly recommend them.

AllCloud did a fantastic job setting up our CRM from scratch, for my sales team of 23 people selling new condominium units in two towers. Ojay was referred to me by a former colleague with another real estate developer, who raved about his skills and service and was absolutely right. He prepared us for the scope of the job and set up a great team including Blake and Dane. They were very speedy, which was important because my large company had taken a long time to preapprove the job due to internal corporate review. When it was time to start, we had to give them less time than originally planned. AllCloud stepped up to the plate and got everything done faster than expected so we could launch our sales on time. Their virtual training of our team was excellent, and everything is working like clockwork with our Salesforce system. I highly recommend AllCloud.

I would not have moved forward had I not been paired with Nathan & Blake. They were wonderful and really worked with us to make everything smooth and easy to implement. I will be coming back for other projects!

AllCloud was and continues to be an incredible partner. Our project with them allowed our Tableau platform to adapt to the current technology of our systems as well as Salesforce and they assisted the innovation of our users. We choose a platform and partner that can easily scale as our company continues to grow and acquire companies.

Our organization being new to Salesforce, AllCloud didn't just to implement our design, but to helped us understand what was possible, and to consider the short and long-term implications of choosing various paths. Over the course of a few months, they helped deliver two sets of apps: Retail Execution in EMEA and CRM with Leads and Opportunities in North America. Along the way, they delivered on time (usually early), on budget, and frequently went above and beyond what we asked.  AllCloud possesses a rare combination of functional and technical expertise along with being excellent communicators, and they are able to relate to business users and IT alike. Routinely they converted our requests into coherent and usable solutions, even when our organization struggled to define requirements. They are an extraordinary partner, we would work with them again without hesitation.

AllCloud provided a solution that met our short-term needs, but also highlighted opportunities for long-term growth. They pre-empted questions and also identified areas for improvement. They pulled aside stakeholders to identify areas of concern, and focused on enabling our core end-users. At the end of the day, it was an open and honest conversation and we are happy to have partnered with them for our Marketing Cloud needs.
Very sound technical team for delivering Salesforce CPQ solution. DocuSign CLM and Project Management was adequate, but companies need to think about supplementing internal skills in these areas.

Implementing CPQ was our third major Salesforce project with AllCloud. As always, AllCloud impressed us with their ability to really understand our goals in implementing CPQ along with our unique requirements. They helped us to take advantage of what CPQ offered out of the box and created supportable custom solutions when the out-of-the box tools would not meet our business needs. They created excellent training and supporting documentation for us, which is critical for our ability to support the tool going forward. Within hours of releasing CPQ, we received a rave review for CPQ from a hard-to-please member of our sales team. We think that’s a sign of great implementation.

AllCloud has been professional and easy to work with every step of the way. They have a methodical process in which they run their projects that allow for transparency and flexibility along the way. We have done two projects with them and will continue to work with them in the future.
AllCloud brings intelligent, hard-working resources to all engagements, and understands SalesForce products inside and out.
He is a true partner, and takes part in the project as if he is part of the company
He is a true partner, and takes part in the project as if he is part of the company
They are great to work with and exude high levels of courtesy and professionalism. They make sure to fully understand our needs in detail to deliver the highest quality product.

I can't say enough good things about working with AllCloud. We tried to migrate to lightning on our own, but failed twice. AllCloud got it done on schedule, ensuring we took advantage of lightning updates along the way. Our salesforce users were thrilled with the results. AllCloud also helped us set up Pardot as part of a strategic marketing initiative. They really listened to us, ensuring we got the right set up for our company and our goals. We've worked with a handful of people at AllCloud over the last year and have found their technical skills, communication, and responsiveness to be excellent. They have truly earned the highest recommendation I can give them.
Will is one of the most phenomenal people I've ever worked with. His patience and knowledge are unparalleled. I hope to cross paths with him in the future on other projects!

My name is Bartlomiej Jan Skorupa and I am the co-founder and Executive Director of Groundwork Opportunities (GO), a nonprofit based in San Francisco. GO is working to create a world beyond extreme poverty by identifying entrepreneurs in neglected communities that have their own ideas to help their communities thrive and then pair these ideas with the support they need to grow.  When you first meet Opry Jay (OJ) from Figure8 Cloud Solutions, you know you from the first minute that you are in for a whirlwind ride of passion, expertise, and dedication to your project. Most importantly, OJ and his team are more than capable of providing a meaningful impact to improve your work.  Figur8 helped with the conception of our Groundwork Opportunities SalesForce usage from the very beginning. From integrating key aspects of SFDC to our website to streamline operations to advising on creating of custom objects, their help was instrumental in our growing success.  From getting the word out about our work when the it was just an idea to providing detailed and insightful feedback on how to improve our usage of SalesForce, we cannot thank OJ and his team enough in helping us in our mission to end extreme poverty by investing in groundbreaking ideas from local entrepreneurs.

Figur8 has been instrumental in helping us to get Salesforce off the ground at our company. At FROSCH GC&E, we work in the meetings and event space. All but one of our employees had prior CRM experience which brought on unique challenges. The process at Figur8 was easy to follow. Jerry and Sean our onsite consultants, were very patient with our team. They did an amazing job of keeping us on task and educated us on how to build our the platform that would best meet our needs. Ojay has been outstanding from our first conversation through following up. His expertise continues to guide us in sharing ways to use the current licenses to accomplish our goals. He is very open to feedback and to share intimate knowledge of salesforce and provided ideas on how to use the current system.

Our company has never worked with a CRM program but knew how desperately we needed one. At first the task seemed daunting, however, the team at Figur8 helped us tremendously customize our Salesforce platform and really took the time to understand our business and evaluate our needs. The entire team was extremely thorough and increcibly patient with all of our questions and concerns. Jerry always got back to me and was very pleasant to work with. Overall, we were extremely satisfied with Figur8 and their entire team to help us understand and launch our Salesforce platform.

I have worked with Figur8 as both a salesforce.com AE as well as a client. Their team has a tremendous knowledge of the salesforce.com platform. Their leadership has a deep knowledge of salesforce.com as they have been on either the professional service team at salesforce.com or as a partner for almost a decade.  They are fair, trustworthy and reliable. They are also professional and easy to work with through any project. I highly recommend leveraging Figur8 for any implementation project.

Figure8 helped me with our salesforce.com implementation and I found the entire team to be experts on the salesforce.com platform and extremely service oriented when it came to our integration. Great experience all around.

Ojay and the Figur8 team are Salesforce veterans. They have completed a number of implementations - from SMBs to Enterprise. They live in the Salesforce world and really understand the platform. In addition, they are really easy to work with and are professional and realistic. In addition, they have even completed implementations of emerging products such as Work.com.

My company has been in the process of implementing several Salesforce platforms over the past two years, however, Figur8 was instrumental in providing the expert push we needed to finally see the pieces come together. The Figur8 team is outstanding in every way –-- knowledge, application, responsiveness, facilitation, problem-solving, etc. Ojay and Richard wholly dedicated their time with our executive team to produce immediate, functional results that we were unable to reach on our own. We are now leveraging Salesforce to our advantage, and with tangible results. Thank you to Figur8 for broadening our scope and Salesforce utilization.
I have worked with other consultants before Figur8 and will never go back! They helped with a range of projects from reports to campaigns. I would highly recommend them over anyone else!

After working with other Salesforce partners I always dreaded launching a new project. Not now. Ojay and his team are AMAZING. I will use them for all my high level administrative needs. They are professional, friendly, knowledgable and accommodating. We came in under budget on our most recent project and they were able to help with additional optimization. These guys know Salesforce in and out, backwards and forwards. Don't waste your time or money using anyone else! Don't hesitate, use Figur8. (Ask for Jhustin and Jerry!)

Working with the folks from Figur8 has been a great experience. We had to migrate our entire sales, support and operations team to Salesforce from a competing CRM while completely overhauling all our workflows and making sure everything stayed in sync with another partner's Saleforce instance on a tight timetable. It was like changing a tire on a moving car. The Figur8 team brought a wealth of experience and confidence to the table and patiently worked with us to find the most elegant and expedient solution. Post development the team has stayed engaged making sure the soution continued to work as expected and acted as a sounding board for future changes and enhancements. I would definitely recommend them to anyone out their looking for help in the Salesforce ecosystem.

The Figur8 team is engaged, resourceful, and able to develop creative solutions that fit my company's needs. We're an ever growing, changing entrepreneurial company and Figur8 has been doing a stellar job keeping up with us.
Figur8 was quick, focused and exacting in the work with us. We will engage them on other projects and highly recommend them to anyone needing their services...

Figur8 was recommended to us by one of the founder's friends. We are glad that we chose them from the other partners that we reached out to. The folks at Figur8 had a great process to educate us about how we could best leverage salesfroce, they understood the needs of our integration exactingly well, and they delivered the project on time and to spec. They also followed up with us on a regular basis post-project to see if things were working fine.  I recommend them and would work with them again in the future.

Figur8 was introduced to us after using Salesforce for the last 4 years. They came in and were able to offer creative solutions to some issues we have been having. They are very knowledgeable and will be our partner moving forward, relying on their expertise to help us implement Service Cloud.

Figur8 was recommended to us by Salesforce.com. Our company had never used Salesforce before and Figure8 walked us through the entire process. They were wonderful. I/we would highly recommend these guys for implementing your Salesforce solutions. We will definitely be using them again.

Working with Figur8 has been absolutely wonderful! They are extremely accommodating to our company's needs and constant growth and changes. Ojay, Alec, and the rest of the team are incredibly helpful and care about your success with Salesforce. We hope to continue working with them well into the future.

The team is very professional, friendly, and has a quick turnaround. The value Figur8 brought to our organization was immense. We would work with them again without a second-thought. They are partners, not vendors and we appreciated their thought-leadership in everything they did for us.

Figur8 is the best technology partner I have worked with on a project. We had engaged them late on a project resulting in extremely difficult deadlines to meet. In addition, the Salesforce solution required developing new integration points with our ERP system, which was new for our technology portfolio. This didn't prevent the Figur8 team from consistently exceeding our expectations and delivering valuable solutions on time or early. They were wonderful to work with and never ceased to amaze us. There is no doubt in their commitment to their customer's success.

We have relied on Figur8 for numerous projects, even post implementation. Figur8 is our first call when we come across a challenging problem in Salesforce that requires their expertise and experience. We don't have a dedicated IT department so their prompt response and knowledge level has become critical in our success with Salesforce. We could not be more pleased and it would be hard to imagine a more indispensable partner.

I give a standing ovation and a 5 star to Brooks Bruce of Figur8! He is better than your favorite playlist or movie or book or vacation spot. A magician with Salesforce and a patience that will make Donald Trump falter. Highly recommend for any and all Salesforce needs. Plus, he's really tall.

I have no IT background and we have no IT department, but they took the time to understand our needs and put together a very impressive solution. In the time allotted, they completed twice the amount of work that I was hoping for, in about half the time. They are very dedicated to providing excellent customer service and fantastic results.

We have relied on Figur8 for numerous projects, even post implementation. Figur8 is our first call when we come across a challenging problem in Salesforce that requires their expertise and experience. We don't have a dedicated IT department so their prompt response and knowledge level has become critical in our success with Salesforce. We could not be more pleased and it would be hard to imagine a more indispensable partner.

When it comes to Figur8, they are clearly leaders in the space of Salesforce consulting services. With their incredible wealth of expertise and knowledge that exists within their team(s), you would be hard-pressed to find a company better suited to handle your requirements.  Figur8 goes the extra mile to ensure the solution and implementation they provide is the right one for your business, and will ask the tough questions to ensure it fits not only now, but in to the future.  They are well organized, efficient, professional, and great people to work with.  Our company is thrilled and looks forward to working with Figur8 on future engagements, and would be happy to provide direct feedback to our results.

We worked with Intigris to scale up our Salesforce integration with the business to future proof our operation. We had worked with them before but now work with more precise needs from the product and processes. We needed the users to be much more self-sufficient and confident in navigating through both Data entry and retrieving insights. Next to this, we needed a lot more automation and validation to be in place to ensure perfect data quality to use Salesforce as the source of Master data for our operation.  By involving Intigris, they not only delivered on the tasks we outlined but also helped us revise our older setup to a more streamlined service, gathering enthusiasm from both users and management by delivering more accessible and better insights to all.  By diving into our setup and licenses, they helped us determine the best use of Salesforce products and features for our needs. Able to clearly argue different approaches from our intended solutions, they made certain we would in the future not run into unforeseen obstacles in our processes, to ensure continued success while fulfilling our current objectives.  All in all, we're happy to have worked with Intigris on this project and are already scoping out the next upgrade to our Salesforce setup, again led by Intigris.
